programme.title: Демоны
programme.desc: Демон со своими людьми планируют забрать деньги у партийного курьера Тузика в загородном ресторане - единственном месте, где те останавливаются на своем маршруте. Демон решает идти на дело вместе со всеми - дело рискованное, и риск должен быть разделен всеми поровну. Индус полюбил официантку японского ресторана Алену. После налёта на курьеров Индус собирается поехать с ней к морю. Перед выездом на "дело" Демон узнаёт от Аллы, что её мама уехала в Кисловодск с Кораблевым. На дело отправились все, как и планировали. Однако в загородном ресторане всё пошло вопреки планам "демонов". Кроме "потенциальных клиентов", Индус заметил ещё нескольких "подозрительных лиц" - в ресторане и на улице. В начавшейся перестрелке все они были убиты. В чемодане Тузика денег не оказалось. Демона и его людей подставили, их всех должны были здесь убить. И если бы не Индус, так бы всё и случилось. Сам Индус погиб. Головастик, человек, вхожий в политические, медийные и прочие круги, выясняет у оставшегося в живых перестрелке политтехнолога Тузика, который перевозил "деньги", что за всей этой историей с попыткой убрать Демона и его людей стоят какие-то "военные".

programme.title: Демоны
programme.desc: Демон со своими людьми планируют забрать деньги у партийного курьера Тузика в загородном ресторане - единственном месте, где те останавливаются на своем маршруте. Демон решает идти на дело вместе со всеми - дело рискованное, и риск должен быть разделен всеми поровну. Индус полюбил официантку японского ресторана Алену. После налёта на курьеров Индус собирается поехать с ней к морю. Перед выездом на "дело" Демон узнаёт от Аллы, что её мама уехала в Кисловодск с Кораблевым. На дело отправились все, как и планировали. Однако в загородном ресторане всё пошло вопреки планам "демонов". Кроме "потенциальных клиентов", Индус заметил ещё нескольких "подозрительных лиц" - в ресторане и на улице. В начавшейся перестрелке все они были убиты. В чемодане Тузика денег не оказалось. Демона и его людей подставили, их всех должны были здесь убить. И если бы не Индус, так бы всё и случилось. Сам Индус погиб. Головастик, человек, вхожий в политические, медийные и прочие круги, выясняет у оставшегося в живых перестрелке политтехнолога Тузика, который перевозил "деньги", что за всей этой историей с попыткой убрать Демона и его людей стоят какие-то "военные".

programme.title: Тёмные лабиринты прошлого
programme.desc: Лиза, поссорившись с мужем, уходит из дома. Только на следующий день его брат находит невестку в лесу без сознания. Лиза не может вспомнить, кто она. Теперь ей предстоит привыкать к прежней жизни. Муж Борис ей кажется совершенно посторонним человеком, а повседневная работа по дому совсем непривычной. Лизу одолевают то смутные воспоминания, то провалы в памяти. Она начинает подозревать у себя признаки психического расстройства. А тем временем на регистратора частной клиники Ирину совершено нападение - девушку спасает случайный прохожий…

programme.title: Тёмные лабиринты прошлого
programme.desc: Лиза, поссорившись с мужем, уходит из дома. Только на следующий день его брат находит невестку в лесу без сознания. Лиза не может вспомнить, кто она. Теперь ей предстоит привыкать к прежней жизни. Муж Борис ей кажется совершенно посторонним человеком, а повседневная работа по дому совсем непривычной. programme.title: Секрет майя
programme.desc: Наташа считает себя виновной в смерти супруга. Он погиб в ДТП, не сумев справиться с управлением. Незадолго до несчастного случая пара эмоционально выясняла отношения. Именно из-за этого муж Наташи в сердцах сел за руль.

programme.title: Секрет майя
programme.desc: Наташа сталкивается с предательством друзей. Кроме того, ее прессуют братки. Она с ужасом выясняет о своем супруге много нового. У мужчины была другая фамилия и семья, о которой Наташа ничего не знала.

programme.title: Секрет майя
programme.desc: Наташе становится известно, что Тома ждет ребенка от Игоря. Отец пытается ее утешить. Он заверяет девушку, что она поедет во Францию. В это время Игорь пытается доехать до города. Он слишком долго пробыл в доме Томы.

programme.title: Секрет майя
programme.desc: Тамара солгала Наталье о своей беременности. К утру Игорь все-таки доезжает до дома возлюбленной. Ему открывает двери ее отец. Он сообщает, что Наташа находится на пути в аэропорт. Игорь намерен догнать ее.

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Сотрудники полиции участвуют во всех особо важных делах – спасении заложников и переговорах с террористами, эвакуации жителей и обезвреживании бомб, охоте на серийного убийцу и даже решении семейных конфликтов. В арсенале у участников ГСР (группы стратегического реагирования) не только высокотехнологичное оружие, но еще и быстрый ум, интуиция и… багаж собственных проблем и травм, которые часто влияют на их работу.

programme.title: Демоны
programme.desc: Демон встречается с Сергеем и вспоминает о том, как его "развёл" Мажор в 1996 году. Мажор тогда сказал, что задолжал Бронштейну более 800 000. Но, оказывается, он выкупил 25% акций Промкредитбанка - того самого, которым пользовался Демон. За то, чтобы прекратилось его преследование, Мажор соглашается передать свою долю банка Демону. Демон звонит Шнурку и просит того сообщить преследующему Мажора Ахмеду, что за Мажора отвечать будет Демон. Приехав домой к Мажору за ожерельем, Демон, Леня и Мажор вышли из машины. Сюда же подъехали Шнурок и Писатель. А ещё здесь же находились Полкан и молодой лейтенант милиции. Но это ещё не всё. Приезда Мажора ждали сыновья Бронштейна. Бронштейны выскочили из машины и начали стрелять в Мажора. Ответный огонь открыли милиционеры. Лейтенант был убит, Полкан и Шнурок ранены. Демон велел Писателю забрать Мажора и увезти к себе домой. Но за всей этой перестрелкой из машины наблюдала любовница Мажора Катя. Скорая помощь увезла Полкана и Шнурка, Писатель увез Мажора, а к Демону подошёл отец Мажора - полковник КГБ, который спросил, не украшением ли интересуется Демон. И пригласил Демона в ресторан. Там Демон сказал отцу Мажора, что согласен обменять ожерелье на его сына. Тем временем в дом к Писателю бесшумно проникает Катя и передаёт Мажору пистолет. Мажор убивает Писателя...

Но за всей этой перестрелкой из машины наблюдала любовница Мажора Катя. Там Демон сказал отцу Мажора, что согласен обменять ожерелье на его сына. Тем временем в дом к Писателю бесшумно проникает Катя и передаёт Мажору пистолет. Мажор убивает Писателя...

programme.title: Демоны
programme.desc: В связи с убийством Сухого милиция усиливает контроль за группой Демона, понимая, что начинается война преступных группировок за передел власти. В офис Демона приходит уголовный авторитет Никсон с бандитом Серым. Визит связан с убийством Сухого. Никсон пытается выяснить, зачем приходил Сухой. Никсону ясно, что у Демона не было причин убивать Сухого. Лена сообщает Демону, что скоро из Парижа должна прилететь их дочь Настя со своим женихом-американцем, и просит встретить их "без понтов", чтобы мальчик не подумал, что у невесты папа бандит. На переговорах с господином Хидэёси Мицутака подвыпивший Шнурок вспоминает, где он видел этого человека, но Демон не дает договорить и отправляет его домой. После встречи с Хидэёси Мицутака в своей квартире был убит Шнурок. Демон встречается с Никсоном, и тот говорит ему, что воры не имеют этому убийству никакого отношения. Кроме этого, Никсон выясняет, что японец - вовсе не японец, а известный аферист по кличке Карел.

programme.title: Демоны
programme.desc: Роман, спасая девушку-мулатку от скинхедов, получает резиновую пулю в затылок. Он жив, но находится в состоянии комы. От Никсона Демон узнаёт, что Вована досрочно с зоны "выкупил" Серый - тоже "безбашенный" блатной из окружения Никсона. Он же и стрелял в Демона и Никсона из автомата. Люди Никсона его уже ищут. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Turns out constant, relentless failure can put a strain on a relationship. Specs and Skinny are no exception, and when yet another chase ends in embarrassment, misfortune, and physical injury, the Docs finally fall prey to "irreconcilable differences". For a shapechanger, Lamput sure doesnt like change; its like mum and dad are fighting. Lamput sets about trying to help the Docs patch things up. When conventional methods fail, our orange buddy is forced to subvert the very fundamentals of animated storytelling. Lamputs perseverance finally pays off. The Docs have an epiphany: this blob trying to fix our friendship? Obviously thats the real enemy.

Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Follow the crazy animated adventures of Lamput, a gooey orange substance that escaped from a secret laboratory as two scientists, Fat Doc and Slim Doc, try their best to catch him. They get themselves in various hilarious situations in an attempt to capture him, but being a master of disguise and having the ability to change shape, Lamput escapes from right under their noses each and every time.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Bunnicula
programme.desc: Once upon a time an extraordinary bunny is born in an average family of bunnies. The little guy looks just like a vampire- he has sharp fangs, his ears remind of bat wings and plus he is scared of sunlight. Bunnicula is never out in daylight, sleeps in a coffin, flies with bat wings, and drains juice from vegetables with his fangs which gives him enormous power. His family is afraid that he will attack somebody so they lock him in an old mansion. Bunnicula has been sleeping for many years until a little girl Mina unlocks hims and makes him a new member of her family. Her dog named Harold makes friends with Bunnicula straight away but the cat Chester is a little bit scared of him and does not seem to be happy about a new pet.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Follow the daily adventures of a 10-year-old boy named Clarence, and his two best friends Sumo and Jeff. Clarence lives with his mother Mary and her boyfriend Chad in the fictional town of Aberdale, and he is optimistic, curious, honest and quirky boy, who sees the best in everyone and gets himself in a variety of funny situations and everyday problems, which he solves with lots of imagination and with the help from his friends.

programme.title: Scooby-doo! Franken Creepy
programme.desc: Velma discovers shes inherited her great great-uncle Dr. Von Dinkensteins cursed castle in the terrifying town of Transylvania Pennsylvania, that is. Just when the Gang persuades Velma to go and claim her inheritance, the ghost of Dinkenstein Castle blows up the Mystery Machine as a warning! Now the Crew must spring back into action, but this time its personal! Whos responsible for the Dinkenstein monster? What family secret has Velma been hiding? Will Fred recover from the loss of his beloved Mystery Machine? Can any helpless snack survive Scooby and Shaggys monster-sized appetites?

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Adventure Time is an American fantasy animated television series that shows a 12-year-old boy Finn and his best friend, a wise 28-year-old (in dog years) dog Jake with magical powers living in Lands of Ooo in post-apocalyptic world. They lean on each other during good and bad times, trust each another with secrets and look to each other for advice. Finn likes to travel and save princesses from evil monsters in Lands of Ooo. Jake is more than his friend, he is his mentor, and his extraordinary skills help the boy to fight evil. Finn and Jake hang out with Princess Bubblegum, the sovereign of the Candy Kingdom, the fearsome Ice King, an ice wizard, Marceline the Vampire Queen, a 1000-year-old vampire and rock musician and many more.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Clayton is a compulsive liar, but Gumball discovers he wasnt lying about his awesome martial arts move. Gumball confronts Clayton about his fabled Seven Pressure Point Heart Exploding Technique, assuming its another one of his outlandish claims. Darwin and Gumball intervene to help Clayton start embracing the truth. However, when they discover the move is as effective as he claimed, they really wish hed been lying.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Mom has forced Dad to install a password on the computer. The pop-up clue advises them that the password is the name of Dads favorite child. After trying "Gumball" and "Darwin" unsuccessfully, they discover the answer is, in fact, "Anais". They are determined to become Dads favourites by any means necessary, even if it means undermining each other, plotting against Anais or driving a wedge between mom and dad.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons run over Santa Claus and must save Christmas. / Gumball and Darwin receive an heirloom from Richard but lose it. / Bobert loses a bet to Gumball so has to obey him for 24 hours. / Gumball asks Idaho to teach his family to live a simpler life. / Gumball teaches Darwin a lesson after Darwin leaves him. / Granny JoJos overprotective behavior puts the Wattersons in danger. / Gumball thinks Teri is way too scared of germs. / Gumball and Darwin rent a film called A Ponys Tail to watch with Anais but keep getting distracted on their way home. / Gumball destroys Alan and Carmens relationship and has to reunite them.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin are shocked to realise that their class isnt the only one in Elmore Junior High. / Dad discovers that Granny Jojo and Louie plan to get married and move to Florida. To stop this happening he adopts Louie so that he can forbid him from marrying Granny Jojo. / After they receive an extravagant invitation to Masamis birthday party Gumball and Darwin are anxious to find just the right gift for her. However theyre not the only ones. / Gumball sets out to prove to Pennys father that hes good enough for his daughter. Director: Mic Graves,.

programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput likes nothing more than a pleasant evening watching the night sky for UFOs. The peaceful night is ruined, of course, by those pesky Docs. Which is a shame, because its the one night where a UFO actually appears. Of the aliens who emerge from the strange craft, one bears a striking resemblance to Skinny - and naturally theres a bit of a mixup. The alien gets to live life as a Doc at the Lab. Hes pretty good at it, too. Skinny has to make his way as the pilot of a spaceship. Hes pretty bad at it too. In the end, the foreign food is the last straw, and both parties agree to resume their old lives. Lamput goes back to watching the skies.

programme.desc: Gumball must help Principal Brown have body confidence about his butt in order to be allowed to do his poem about butts at the Poetry Recital.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin must stop an evil social media app from turning every kid in Elmore into mindless internet-trend-following drone.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The kids try to help Dad bond with Frankie. / When the uncomfortableness between them reaches new levels Gumball and Hot Dog Guy decide they have to confront their ongoing awkwardness by making things as awkward as possible. / The kids realise that theyve never known their neighbours name, and theyre way past the window where they can ask. / Gumball has something uncomfortable to tell Penny but doesnt know how, until he makes a deal with Principal Brown. / Gumball and Anais go head to head in a leadership election voted for by their classmates. / Clayton realises he can imitate his classmates, and begins stealing the lives of the people of Elmore. / When unexpected couples in the world of Elmore start randomly falling in love, Gumball and Darwin have to figure out whats going on. / Gumball questions Mr Smalls eco-friendly commitment, causing him to abandon society and live in the forest. Director: Mic Graves.

programme.title: Bunnicula
programme.desc: Once upon a time an extraordinary bunny is born in an average family of bunnies. The little guy looks just like a vampire- he has sharp fangs, his ears remind of bat wings and plus he is scared of sunlight. Bunnicula is never out in daylight, sleeps in a coffin, flies with bat wings, and drains juice from vegetables with his fangs which gives him enormous power. His family is afraid that he will attack somebody so they lock him in an old mansion. Bunnicula has been sleeping for many years until a little girl Mina unlocks hims and makes him a new member of her family. Her dog named Harold makes friends with Bunnicula straight away but the cat Chester is a little bit scared of him and does not seem to be happy about a new pet.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Adventure Time is an American fantasy animated television series that shows a 12-year-old boy Finn and his best friend, a wise 28-year-old (in dog years) dog Jake with magical powers living in Lands of Ooo in post-apocalyptic world. They lean on each other during good and bad times, trust each another with secrets and look to each other for advice. Finn likes to travel and save princesses from evil monsters in Lands of Ooo. Jake is more than his friend, he is his mentor, and his extraordinary skills help the boy to fight evil. Finn and Jake hang out with Princess Bubblegum, the sovereign of the Candy Kingdom, the fearsome Ice King, an ice wizard, Marceline the Vampire Queen, a 1000-year-old vampire and rock musician and many more.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Grandpa Louie gives them a cheque, the Watterson kids argue over how to spend the money. / When they find Anais training herself for a brutal showdown Gumball and Darwin realise that their sister is being pestered at school by an annoying kid: Billy. / An impromptu hug with a stranger at school leaves Gumball in an increasingly awkward social situation. / Mom and the kids depart for their hard days work leaving a seemingly lazy Dad half-asleep on the sofa. Mom has given him one very simple job: buy mayonnaise. Director: Mic Graves,.

programme.title: Quest Means Business
programme.desc: Hes not messing around: Richard Quest presents his hot takes on the biggest breaking stories in the world of business. Watch for the expert analysis, commentary and opinions on the important headlines in the field from the notorious English journalist and CNN anchor. Joined by a cast of experts and correspondents delivering unrivaled facts and news, but also features and fascinating takes, figures and analysis on everything going down in the world of business.

programme.title: The Lead with Jake Tapper
programme.desc: News, politics and current affairs programme hosted by the award-winning, American journalist and author, Jake Tapper. Jake Tapper is the chief Washington correspondent for CNN and he will share his knowledge and insight into politics as well as covering a variety of other topics. This programme discusses a range of stories from topical events including national news, economics/finance, sports, health, technology and world affairs. The Lead with Jake Tapper has won a number of awards and accolades including three National Headliner Awards. Outside his work on television, Tapper has written for The New Yorker, The Washington Post and the Los Angeles Times as well as publishing his first novel, a political thriller.

programme.title: World Sport
programme.desc: One of the CNNs longest running programmes that allows viewers to find out all the global sports news, see all the important events and most interesting parts, and enjoy the interviews with sports pundits and various sports stars.

programme.title: The Brief with Jim Sciutto
programme.desc: The best of CNNs reporting from correspondents across the world, to guide global audiences through the fast-paced news cycle with insight, analysis and hard-hitting interviews.

programme.title: Erin Burnett OutFront
programme.desc: Hosted by Erin Burnett, an expert in political science and economics, OutFront is an hour-long news programme examining the latest stories from the US and further afield. Broadcast live from either the New York studio or live on location from the site of a breaking story, the show features insightful opinions from informed guests. With expert analysis from CNNs correspondents and analysis from the shows panel, Erin Burnett OutFront dissects the stories of the day, leaving no stone unturned. Burnett, a former financial analyst for Goldman Sachs, uses her forthright approach to engage interviewees in honest discussion.

programme.title: Anderson Cooper
programme.desc: Anderson Cooper delves into the days news, looking beyond the broadcast to give his take, prompting us to re-think what we hear in the headlines. Cooper has covered major, international stories like the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina on the Gulf Coast, the catastrophic BP oil spill and the 2010 earthquake in Haiti, which saw the whole world fall silent. The show has won an absolute plethora of awards over the years, including GLAAD Media and Emmy awards.

programme.title: The Source with Kaitlan Collins
programme.desc: Kaitlan Collins goes straight to the source for the best reporting on the days biggest stories.

programme.title: CNN NewsNight
programme.desc: Abby Phillip leads a roundtable discussion on the days biggest stories and issues shaping our world.

programme.title: Laura Coates Live
programme.desc: Laura Coates goes inside the story with a relentless pursuit of the facts.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom
programme.desc: CNN Newroom provides the most up to date news as it breaks and is the longest running show on the channel, airing twice a day Monday to Friday and throughout the day over the weekends. CNN has developed a lot since its founding in 1980 by American media proprietor Ted Turner as a 24 hour cable news channel. As an organisation, CNN have won multiple awards, including a network-record six news and documentary Emmy Awards in 2018.

programme.title: POV
programme.desc: Walk down the street in Tokyo, and there will be echoes of it everywhere. The subtle, sophisticated chic of iki was born during Japans Edo period and still defines Tokyos modern urban pulse. Its seen as a core value in Japanese taste and behavior, from the way people dress to how they express themselves. So what is iki? In its most basic form its an aesthetic ideal: a subtle, effortless elegance that values authenticity, refinement and unpretentious style. In response to strict social codes banning overt displays of wealth, the merchant class of Edo (now Tokyo) developed iki as a discreet form of rebellion. Subtle details like luxurious kimono linings or intricate accessories were hidden beneath plain exteriors. Over time this urban code filtered from fashion into the arts - which for the first time in Edo society were flourishing beyond the upper class. Hanako Montgomery explores her home city Tokyo through the lens of its former Edo identity. She traces the footsteps of the people that fashioned iki, and meets the Tokyoites of today keeping this urban code of understated cool alive today through fashion, art and poetry.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom
programme.desc: CNN Newroom provides the most up to date news as it breaks and is the longest running show on the channel, airing twice a day Monday to Friday and throughout the day over the weekends. CNN has developed a lot since its founding in 1980 by American media proprietor Ted Turner as a 24 hour cable news channel. As an organisation, CNN have won multiple awards, including a network-record six news and documentary Emmy Awards in 2018.

programme.title: Marketplace Africa
programme.desc: As tourist numbers continue to rise worldwide, African wildlife parks are facing unprecedented challenges. In Kenyas iconic Masai Mara Reserve, the home of the Great Migration and one of the natural wonders of the world, the number of wildebeest migrating has dropped as tourist numbers have gone up. We take a look at the delicate balancing act required to ensure the preservation of the migration with evergrowing travel demands. Also: ranked one of Africas growing companies by the Financial Times in 2024, Hubtel originally began two decades ago as a messaging company in Ghana. Since then, its turned into an e-payments and commerce behemoth with 23 offices across Ghana. We spoke to CEO Alex Bram about the companys pivot towards fintech, growth strategy, and the importance of staying purely self funded within Ghana.

programme.title: Marketplace Asia
programme.desc: Marketplace Asia on CNN offers unique access to the latest Asian market information, with a look at latest events and developments that impact its business world. Follow the top business stories that influence and shape the Asian continent. Have a look at the interviews with outstanding figures of business and industry and reveal the economic trends in various regions of Asia to get to know the continents key sectors and corporations.

CNN is a constantly evolving and diversifying channel and African Voices is evidence of this new approach to news, utilising sources from across the globe. As an organisation, CNN have won multiple awards, including a network-record six news and documentary Emmy Awards in 2018.

programme.title: Quests World of Wonder
programme.desc: Join our host, Richard Quest, as he takes us on a journey of discovery to some of the most iconic cities on the planet. Richard encounters many of the influential local inhabitants and delves into the heritage and culture of each city to reveal what makes them unique and fascinating. The first series sees Richard travel around the globe to visit Washington D.C. and explore the awesome power that resides in the city; in Panama City, Richard searchess for some of the legendary figures who shaped its identity; the vibrancy of Nairobi excites the imagination while Athens treis to sustain its legacy in the modern world; multi-cultural London reveals its elegant and martial history and the people of Berlin enahnce its attractions; and the exotic and singular atmosphere of Istanbul delights the senses.

programme.title: CNN Marketplace Europe
programme.desc: We hit the red carpet for a look at the state of Europes film industry, from Venice to London. programme.title: Inside Africa
programme.desc: Rising dramatically from the plains of southern Malawi, Mount Mulanje is a soaring granite massif known as the "Island in the Sky." It is home to a fragile and unique ecosystem and at its heart stands the Mulanje cedar (Widdringtonia whytei), a tree so rare its found nowhere else on Earth. Once covering vast slopes of the mountain, the cedar is now critically endangered. Illegal logging, wildfires, and climate change have brought it to the brink, with only a handful of mature, seed-producing trees ever documented in recent years. Declared Malawis national tree, the cedar has become a symbol of both loss and resilience. We explore the bold and deeply collaborative effort to bring this species back from the edge. At the core of this movement are local Malawians, young men and women who grow thousands of cedar seedlings in grassroots nurseries, carry them in woven baskets to high- altitude planting sites, and spend days traversing rugged trails to restore whats been lost. Their work is physically demanding and often overlooked, but essential to the projects success.

In its most basic form its an aesthetic ideal: a subtle, effortless elegance that values authenticity, refinement and unpretentious style. In response to strict social codes banning overt displays of wealth, the merchant class of Edo (now Tokyo) developed iki as a discreet form of rebellion. Subtle details like luxurious kimono linings or intricate accessories were hidden beneath plain exteriors. Over time this urban code filtered from fashion into the arts - which for the first time in Edo society were flourishing beyond the upper class. Hanako Montgomery explores her home city Tokyo through the lens of its former Edo identity. She traces the footsteps of the people that fashioned iki, and meets the Tokyoites of today keeping this urban code of understated cool alive today through fashion, art and poetry.

programme.title: CNN Marketplace Europe
programme.desc: We hit the red carpet for a look at the state of Europes film industry, from Venice to London. In the face of economic uncertainty and rising tariffs, how will the creative industry respond? As countries like Italy and the UK replace Hollywood as the go-to destinations for on-location shooting, we speak to some of the major players in the industry to find out how Europe has catapulted itself forward, and whether it can stay at the front of the pack.

programme.title: Marketplace Asia
programme.desc: Marketplace Asia on CNN offers unique access to the latest Asian market information, with a look at latest events and developments that impact its business world. Follow the top business stories that influence and shape the Asian continent. Have a look at the interviews with outstanding figures of business and industry and reveal the economic trends in various regions of Asia to get to know the continents key sectors and corporations.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom
programme.desc: CNN Newroom provides the most up to date news as it breaks and is the longest running show on the channel, airing twice a day Monday to Friday and throughout the day over the weekends. CNN has developed a lot since its founding in 1980 by American media proprietor Ted Turner as a 24 hour cable news channel. As an organisation, CNN have won multiple awards, including a network-record six news and documentary Emmy Awards in 2018.

programme.title: World Sport
programme.desc: One of the CNNs longest running programmes that allows viewers to find out all the global sports news, see all the important events and most interesting parts, and enjoy the interviews with sports pundits and various sports stars.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom
programme.desc: CNN Newroom provides the most up to date news as it breaks and is the longest running show on the channel, airing twice a day Monday to Friday and throughout the day over the weekends. CNN has developed a lot since its founding in 1980 by American media proprietor Ted Turner as a 24 hour cable news channel. As an organisation, CNN have won multiple awards, including a network-record six news and documentary Emmy Awards in 2018.

programme.title: Inside Africa
programme.desc: Rising dramatically from the plains of southern Malawi, Mount Mulanje is a soaring granite massif known as the "Island in the Sky." It is home to a fragile and unique ecosystem and at its heart stands the Mulanje cedar (Widdringtonia whytei), a tree so rare its found nowhere else on Earth. Once covering vast slopes of the mountain, the cedar is now critically endangered. Illegal logging, wildfires, and climate change have brought it to the brink, with only a handful of mature, seed-producing trees ever documented in recent years. Declared Malawis national tree, the cedar has become a symbol of both loss and resilience. We explore the bold and deeply collaborative effort to bring this species back from the edge. At the core of this movement are local Malawians, young men and women who grow thousands of cedar seedlings in grassroots nurseries, carry them in woven baskets to high- altitude planting sites, and spend days traversing rugged trails to restore whats been lost. Their work is physically demanding and often overlooked, but essential to the projects success.

programme.title: Quests World of Wonder
programme.desc: Join our host, Richard Quest, as he takes us on a journey of discovery to some of the most iconic cities on the planet. Richard encounters many of the influential local inhabitants and delves into the heritage and culture of each city to reveal what makes them unique and fascinating. The first series sees Richard travel around the globe to visit Washington D.C. and explore the awesome power that resides in the city; in Panama City, Richard searchess for some of the legendary figures who shaped its identity; the vibrancy of Nairobi excites the imagination while Athens treis to sustain its legacy in the modern world; multi-cultural London reveals its elegant and martial history and the people of Berlin enahnce its attractions; and the exotic and singular atmosphere of Istanbul delights the senses.

programme.title: Inside Politics
programme.desc: Inside Politics is a political talk show, broadcast on CNN and anchored by CNN Chief National Correspondent John King. It features the most important political stories presented by a panel of well-sourced reporters. John King is an experienced reporter who covers the White House, Congress and the campaign trail, and interviews presidents, politicians and voters.

programme.title: U.S. State of the Union Address
programme.desc: The Speech is addressed to the Congress and the American people. It aims to highlight administration work and its victories, target political enemies and demonstrate the Presidents vision for the whole country.

programme.title: Fareed Zakaria GPS
programme.desc: Weekly public affairs show hosted by an American journalist, political scientist, and author Fareed Zakaria. The show is broadcasted on CNN every Sunday in many countries of the world. The "GPS" in the shows title stands for "Global Public Square," a reference to the shows focus on international issues and foreign affairs. The guests of the shows one-on-one interviews and roundtable discussions are most prominent figures in the world of global politics, economy and global decision-makers and influencers.

programme.title: African Voices Changemakers
programme.desc: African Voices: Change makers is a CNN programme that focuses on some of Africas brightest and most brilliant change makers as they engineer innovative solutions or beneficial changes that will positively impact their communities. CNN is a constantly evolving and diversifying channel and African Voices is evidence of this new approach to news, utilising sources from across the globe. As an organisation, CNN have won multiple awards, including a network-record six news and documentary Emmy Awards in 2018.

programme.title: Blueprint
programme.desc: Many people travel to Mongolia to disconnect, to escape into the vast wilderness and switch off. But for Mongolians, connectivity is everything. The country has 3.5 million people and 5 million active phone numbers. Everywhere you look in the capital city Ulaanbaatar, people are glued to their phones. A vibrant startup scene in the city is driving innovation and diversifying Mongolias economy beyond its mining roots, fueled by a young, ambitious, and entrepreneurial population. A new digital infrastructure is not only reshaping how people travel, live and shop here - but tackling some of the countrys biggest challenges: congestion, pollution and climate change. Innovations first cultivated in the city are taking root in remote corners of the country, where 30% of the population still live nomadic lifestyles. Forget Silicon Valley, this is the Silicon Steppe, where homegrown startups are powering Mongolias digital transformation.

Body Cam
programme.desc: Documentary series following police officers across the USA as they put their lives on the line to enforce the law. Using real footage from the officers body cameras, we show just how deadly routine checks can be, with law enforcement officials having to think on their feet and make split-second decisions to potentially save their, or someone elses, life. From knife-wielding maniacs to brutal shootouts, the series highlights the importance of our police departments. With interviews from the officers involved adding context to the footage, Body Cam Cops gives viewers unprecedented, exclusive access to what life is truly like in the line of duty.

programme.title: Edge of Alaska
programme.desc: McCarthy, Alaska is home to a rugged bunch of mavericks and risk takers, willing to brave the brutal conditions in this icy, isolated town. Once a thriving, prosperous place due to the gold rush, the town is now home to a mere 40 people. There is a juxtaposition between residents; while some believe in a traditional way of life, others are desperate to drag McCarthy into the modern age, believing this is the only way to ensure its survival. Edge of Alaska tells the story of this community at a crossroads.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: Expert craftsmen are bringing Drew Pritchards finds back to life and restore them to their former glory. Drew hunts for treasures such as derelict gems and forgotten remnants across the country. And then he and his team do the restoration turning trash to gold, so that worn objects become shining gems for which Drews customers want to pay a lot of money. All kinds of items can and will be restored, starting from a century-old suitcase to an ancient coffee machine, from a ravaged carousel horse to a large railway clock.

programme.title: Diesel Brothers
programme.desc: Unique American reality series that follows a group of friends in Utah- David Heavy D Sparks, David Diesel Dave Kiley, and their crew at DieselSellerz who sell parts for diesel trucks and jeeps, repair and customize pickup trucks. They design and build some of the biggest and most amazing diesel powered vehicles you will ever see, and also do truck giveaways. Watch as they create these awesome masterpieces and enjoy all the crazy adventures they get into while doing it.

programme.title: Road Rage
programme.desc: Bicyclists cope with road-raging drivers. A man records a tense moment in a New Jersey parking lot. An angry driver phones a man who cut him off.

programme.title: Road Rage
programme.desc: Motorists fend off brake-checking buffoons. A family defends themselves from a knife-wielding man. Two women get heated in a hospital parking lot.

programme.title: Border Control Italia
programme.desc: Follows the officers of the Security and Customs Services at the borders of Italy, which are under the constant threat from drugs, weapons, and suspected terrorists.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. The budget is limited, though you can see some exclusive and rare cars. Mike Brewer, a British dealer chooses the car carefully and hands it over to the mechanic, first Edd China, later Ant Anstead to be fixed and upgraded. The hosts are real masters of their trade, it seems they can bring life even to a piece of metal. It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: Classic Cars
programme.desc: Drew Pritchard and Paul Cowland travel across the United Kingdom to uncover classic cars to buy, restore and sell on for a profit. The pair scour garages, barns and facilities to discover collectible cars which include the likes of the Morris Minor Traveller, Jaguar XJS, Rover P6 and a BMW 635 CSI among many others. The combination of Drews expertise of negotiation and deal-making and Pauls extensive mechanical knowledge makes them a formidable team ready to tackle anything challenging that comes their way.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered how things that surround us every day are produced? Find out about the whole process from the beginning to the end in a documentary television series How Its Made. The series demonstrates how various items like clothing and accessories, food, industrial products, cars, musical instruments and many more are manufactured. Who would have thought how exciting it would be to watch a cupcake, formula 1 race car or gummy vitamins being made?

programme.title: American Chopper
programme.desc: American Chopper is an American reality television series that revolves around the Teutuls- Paul Senior, his sons Paul Junior and Michael who work together at Orange County Choppers, a custom motorcycle fabrication company located in Montgomery, New York. The series is a mix of competition and drama, famous for real fighting, cursing, crying, welding, and painting. Its indisputable that each Teutul is a gifted mechanic, engineer and designer, they put together a motorbike in front of the viewers and make every customers wish come true.

programme.title: The Autobahn A2
programme.desc: One of Europes busiest, most dangerous and most important highways. For many people its their place of work, and many more use it to travel across Europe.

programme.title: The Autobahn A2
programme.desc: One of Europes busiest, most dangerous and most important highways. For many people its their place of work, and many more use it to travel across Europe.

programme.title: Steel Buddies
programme.desc: Michael Manousakis is a certified petrol head, but with a fondness for more than just the ordinary car. Manousakis is the owner of Morlock Motors, a mechanic yard operating out of Peterslahr, Germany. Alongside his team of experts, he buys, repairs and sells disused and beaten-up US army vehicles, distributing them back around the world to a wide array of eager customers. Whether its helping a British expat move a Centurion tank home, driving amphibious vehicles on the river Rhine or taking to the skies in age-old aeroplanes, Michael Manousakis enjoys adventuring out in these old military vehicles as much as he does repairing them.

programme.title: 100 Days Wild
programme.desc: The brute harshness of Alaskas wilderness is no joke, with hostile weather and dangerous animals constantly lurking on the horizon. In this documentary series, a group of seven strangers give up their creature comforts to build a self-sustaining community along the Tanana River, and they have 100 days before the biting chill of winter arrives. They must quickly learn to work as a team if their makeshift community is going to work, learning to hunt, gather and implement basic structures that will keep them dry and warm. Will they be able to handle the wilderness?

programme.title: Abalone Wars
programme.desc: In South Australia fierce storms have forced the abalone crews to spend weeks in port; what will they risk to fill their quotas before the disappointing season wraps up?

programme.title: Expedition Unknown
programme.desc: American archaeologist, author and explorer Josh Gates explores the world to solve longstanding mysteries and legends that are yet to be solved. With no story too big, Josh travels across the globe to identify clues and secrets that could help him find the truth. First he must gather as much information about the case, before jetting off to pursue his leads. Whether its uncovering long lost Nazi treasures, unearthing the birth place of Jesus, deciphering the origin of Stonehenge or investigating the Vikings rise to power, Josh leaves no stone unturned in his quest for answers.

programme.title: Expedition X
programme.desc: Join our hosts, adventurer Josh Gates, scientist Phil Torres and paranormal researcher Jessica Chobot, as they travel around the planet uncovering the secrets behind supernatural phenomena, mythical beasts and alien activity. Each trip leads the team on a quest to reveal the bizarre truth of these fascinating stories. Epsiodes include a journey deep into the Cambodian jungle to search for a monster from a lost city; a spelunking expedition sees the team investigating the largest cave system in the world; an active volcano in Washington state might hold the clue to some extraterrestrial mysteries; and an exploration of a haunted dwelling in the Amazon causes panic in the middle of the night.

programme.title: NASAs Unexplained Files
programme.desc: What do we really know about life beyond the realm of our planet? Disturbing discoveries about the rest of our universe have perplexed scientists, and the rest of the world, for as long as we can remember. Now, the files and discoveries of one of the worlds biggest independent agencies have been dug up, for thorough investigation. Each episode scrutinises questionable evidence, encounters and sightings, to shed some light on the unexplained files of NASA. Featuring testimonies of NASA insiders and scientists who have first hand experience of the enigmas, laying within our universe.

programme.title: Survival instinct
programme.desc: Each week, a new pair of total strangers are faced with the ultimate survival challenge: survive for 21 days together with no clothes or supplies in some of the most dangerous environments in the world. In addition to the landscape itself working against the duo, the local wildlife stalk them as well. Of course, the biggest complication for any of the couples might end up being their own clashing egos. Will they make it out alive, or will they fall victim to the wilderness? They must fall back on their most primal instincts to ensure they dont become prey themselves.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: Classic Cars

The pair scour garages, barns and facilities to discover collectible cars which include the likes of the Morris Minor Traveller, Jaguar XJS, Rover P6 and a BMW 635 CSI among many others. The combination of Drews expertise of negotiation and deal-making and Pauls extensive mechanical knowledge makes them a formidable team ready to tackle anything challenging that comes their way.

Drew loves the thrill of the hunt and while he gets his hands dirty in the countrys architectural backwaters, his team of restorers is back at the shop giving old and rare finds a new lease on life!

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered how things that surround us every day are produced? Find out about the whole process from the beginning to the end in a documentary television series How Its Made. The series demonstrates how various items like clothing and accessories, food, industrial products, cars, musical instruments and many more are manufactured. Who would have thought how exciting it would be to watch a cupcake, formula 1 race car or gummy vitamins being made?

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. The budget is limited, though you can see some exclusive and rare cars. Mike Brewer, a British dealer chooses the car carefully and hands it over to the mechanic, first Edd China, later Ant Anstead to be fixed and upgraded. The hosts are real masters of their trade, it seems they can bring life even to a piece of metal. It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers

programme.title: Baggage Battles
programme.desc: Featuring professional buyers including antique dealers, a production designer and an eCommerce expert, these expert buyers travel around the world to lost baggage auctions, estate auctions and police auctions to find the hidden treasure and items left behind or siezed by customs in order to make the greatest profit. This American docu-reality series created by The Travel Channel in 2012. Finding contents in baggage such as a bronze sculpture, jewellery including 18 karat gold and a legendary belt, these professionals prove why they have a name for themselves in their industry, finding hidden gems in hidden places.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Treehouse Masters is an American reality television series hosted by Pete Nelson, a treehouse builder. Pete and his team design and build all types of treehouses for clients across the country. The clients and Petes team are the people who never stop dreaming. Youll be surprised to know how many people want to get away from the noisy comfortable cities and live in close communion with mother nature. So getting a treehouse is their chance to live a dream. Every episode will amaze you because of Petes talent and incredible imagination. He can build any type of a treehouse, starting from a small simple ones to most complex residences with all modern communication. Every wish of a customer will be heard and fulfilled.

programme.title: Farmhouse Fixer
programme.desc: Singer Jonathan Knight demonstrates his renovation know-how skills. He has renovated more than 200 houses, while preserving their original craftsmanship. He has been in this for more than 25 years, and thanks to his passion and talent he updates interiors while keeping the historical charm and chic.

programme.title: Flippin RVs
programme.desc: Tiny Trailer Trouble. Justin and Anna have their hands full restoring a 1956 Santa Fe trailer for a vintage RV park, but Justin cant turn away a loyal client who drops by with her 1967 Serro Scotty that needs a few fixes on a tight turnaround.

programme.title: Tiny House Hunters
programme.desc: Reality series showing American house hunters who are considering joining the tiny-house revolution where people are choosing to live in smaller homes - often less than 55 square metres -and praising their benefits. In this property series realtors present three petite houses to prospective buyers. Some of the homes would be used as permanent residences whilst others could be a retreat to escape to. There are various reasons for the trend for tiny-living; some people are doing it for financial reasons, others are trying to live more ecologically and some yearn for a simpler lifestyle. When the potential tiny-homeowners are faced with the practical limitations of the properties on offer will they take the plunge and embrace the joys of tiny living? Or will they change their minds for more spacious accommodation?

programme.desc: Road police on the hunt for posers and speeders all over Germany. The professionals know exactly whats impressive about cars - and whats illegal.

programme.title: Border Control Poland
programme.desc: Security and Customs are working hard on the border of Poland constantly trying to prevent illegal items from entering the country. They are on the 24/7 watch detecting crimes and preventing them from happening. Dogs are great helpers when it comes to sniffing up hidden contraband.

programme.title: Border Control Italia
programme.desc: Follows the officers of the Security and Customs Services at the borders of Italy, which are under the constant threat from drugs, weapons, and suspected terrorists.

programme.title: Race of Life
programme.desc: In this episode we explore the Race of Life on a small scale but no less competive or cruel for all that. Insects burrow through the ground, hop and sing in the trees, and dart and dance in the air. They come in many different colors and shapes. There are many reasons why insects are so successful at surviving. Their ability to survive in all kinds of temperatures and environments. A strong, hard but flexible shell called an exoskeleton covers their soft organs and is resistant to chemicals, water and physical impact. Their wings give them the option of flying away from dangerous situations or toward food or mates. In this episode: Dragonflies hover like helicopters over ponds and lakes, then suddenly dart away, pursuing prey or other dragonflies. The monarch butterfly goes through a miraculous metamorphosis, changing from an egg to a hungry caterpillar to a quiet pupa and emerging as a beautiful winged adult. The praying mantis is master of disguise. Its green body, wings and legs merge into the green, leafy background so carefully it seems to be part of the grass. Perched at an angle, with its spiny forelegs raised in a prayerlike pose, the mantis sits in still rigidness - until another insect such as a fly comes too near and is suddenly captured and devoured. Ants, like bees, hornets and wasps, are social insects and live together in colonies in many-chambered nests. Whatever it takes, to stay in the race.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Chasing Tales
programme.desc: Rosemary catches up with the conservancys rarest large carnivore, a coalition of 3 male cheetahs. The Pungwe pack get waist deep into their hunting as they pursue a wildebeest into a water pan. Denning season has begun. The pack are on the hunt for impala. Rosemary deals with a shocking snare removal. The splinters take on another herd of wildebeest.

programme.title: Wax in the City
programme.desc: Africa is in fashion! Its flag? Wax print, which more and more Franco-African designers are choosing to incorporate into their creations. Flora Coquerel, a Franco-Beninese woman and the winner of MissFrance 2014, invites us to follow them in their intense and globalised life for a success story - how the colours of a simple fabric have become the symbol of the cultural melting pot of an entire generation!

programme.title: Trouble in Lemur Land
programme.desc: High up in the mountains of north-eastern Madagascar lives one of the worlds most critically endangered primates. There are less than a thousand Silky Sifakas alive today and this area of remote rainforest, known as Marojejy-Anjanaharibe-Sud, is their only home.In the past, the rugged terrain here kept the Silkies relatively safe but things are now changing at an alarming pace. This magical place is under serious threat from illegal logging operations as international demand for highly sought-after rosewood and ebony increases. Unscrupulous logging gangs are encroaching on the Silkies last remaining habitat."Trouble in Lemur Land" follows two men, an American primatologist and a Malagasy conservationist, on their quest to protect this rare species, at the same time providing a rare glimpse into the life of this extraordinarily beautiful and graceful animal.The film centres around the arrival of two babies in the group - a glimmer of hope in an otherwise desperate situation. Lemur reproduction rates are slow and Silkies only mate one day in the year, so it is a very special moment when primatologist Erik Patel sees the newborns for the first time. He has a permanent camp on the outskirts of their last remaining territory and we are given a rare glimpse into this intimate, close-knit group as the babies develop in the sanctuary of the forest canopy.Meanwhile, taking advantage of long-term political instability, the loggers are steadily extracting Madagascars rosewood for export to China. Although they are well armed and highly motivated, conservationist Desire Rabary is not afraid to confront them, regardless of the risks. He heads up a network of local people who play a vital role in the survival of the forest and its lemurs. Over the past five years, he has worked hard to actively expose the loggers illegal trail of destruction but, as this film reveals, the heart of the problem starts on his own doorstep.This 50-minute HD film brings the forest to life, with stunning images of many of its other species, including the striking helmet vanga bird, white-fronted brown lemur, red-bellied lemur, green tree frogs, panther chameleons and the elusive fossa. This treasure trove of endemic Madagascan wildlife is a timely reminder of what we stand to lose if the environmental issues so critical to their survival are not urgently addressed.

programme.title: Perception and Reality: The Magic of Science
programme.desc: Our film follows researchers who are bringing magicians tricks into the laboratory. With impossible magic, amazing facts, and opportunities for viewers to participate in the magic tricks, this extraordinary exploration peeks behind the curtain into a fascinating world where ancient magic meets modern science. Magician Julie Eng not only mystifies us with magic, she also takes us to Montreals McGill University to meet Jay Olson who is using card tricks to study consciousness. His research also includes an MRI machine that can apparently not only read minds, but also manipulate thoughts. In the US we meet with professor Anthony Barnhart. Hes a magician turned scientist who is using magic principles to investigate why we sometimes dont see whats right under our noses. We also meet Professor Amory Danek who is using the conjurors craft to study creativity and problem solving.Professor Ronald Rensink at the University of British Columbia discovered how small distractions can blind drivers to obvious dangers. These studies naturally led him to work with magicians to explore possible new experiments.In London England Gustav Kuhn conducts a study that tracks the eye movements of the magicians audience. We see tricks that fool us despite nothing actually happening, as well as demonstrations that reveal we can be blind even to our own choices. Colourful and compelling, our film takes a critical and engaging look at the fascinating facts revealed when you see the human mind through the eyes of a magician.

programme.title: Mongolia, Steppes Emirate
programme.desc: Battered by strong winds, and seen as a grazing land, Mongolia is the kingdom of steppes. With important mineral resources such as copper or uranium, coal and rare soil, Mongolia future is secure: the economy shows a significant growth rate and it is a business paradise for some expatriates. But for most of the population, needs remain unfulfilled.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: As warfare has evolved, many military techniques and technologies have been adapted for use in urban settings by police units around the world. This episode provides viewers with an intimate perspective on what it feels like to be "inside the heads" of special police personnel, and how their use of military-style strategies and equipment allows them to save lives. From riot control in South Africa and the lessons learned from its excesses, to Los Angeles Police Chief Robert Gates creation of an elite police S.W.A.T team, CQB will showcase how, over the past 30 years, the fight against urban crime has evolved into a military scenario, with both sides using increasingly complex weaponry and tactics.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: Derek Acorahs The Past Hunters travel to Knutsford and investigate a former Crown Court. Multiple people have been sentenced to death and life in prison, but will the team encounter any of its former inmates tonight?

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: Built in the early 1800s, Whitby Hall used to be an administrative center and now stands as a public park and arts center. It has never before been investigated, but staff have reported many noises and presences among them.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Were shipping off to Belfast, Northern Ireland on todays episode. First, well gawk at the worlds biggest Titanic museum. Then, well learn about the provinces complicated history at the Ulster Museum. Finally, we get thrown in the slammer at the very creepy, Crumlin Road Jail.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: This under-visited, and far western Kenyan park area, is renowned for its giant flamingo gatherings that literally turn lakes pink. We explore these many parks on foot, in a safari vehicle and on horseback searching out the local legends that have marked this region the death zone. Our host faces imminent doom in three unique parks in this fast-paced episode.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: One of the 7 Natural Wonders of the World, Victoria Falls is an amazing spectacle that straddles the Zambia/Zimbabwe border. The force of the water is so intense that the water bouncing back creates a rainforest. Remarkably, the wildlife in the area is as abundant as the water going over the falls.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: Amongst the 1190 islands that make up the Maldives archipelago we can find a real pearl: Huvafen Fushi. Suites that look out over the water, natural pools and uncontaminated long beaches surround the unique underwater SPA, between corals and sea creatures. Those are the real luxuries that the Maldives donate to us: We explore a coral nursery cultivated by an Austrian marine biologist, a colony of sting-rays, who come close to the shore at sunset, sharks that move around close to the resort and can be seen from the overwater suites. All together with other fishes that parade in front of us, as if they were on the cat-walk of a fashion show

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: On board a catamaran, we discover several islands in the Society Island archipelago, in Polynesia. Of the Island of Raiatea, hilly and volcanic, we explore the Faaroa River, the only river that you can sail down in Polynesia that is bordered by lush vegetation and fruit trees. A narrow natural passage separate the Island of Raiatea from the Island of Tahaa, both are surrounded by the same coral reef. It is on the Island of Tahaa that Brian and his wife show us their vanilla plantation and the way that it is cultivated as well as their banana, papaya, mango and rambuthan plantations. Remaining on Tahaa we go to discover the very special process of pearl cultivation of the famous Polynesian Black Pearl both on land and under the sea. A real miracle of these South Sea Islands.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: In this episode we explore Las Vegas lesser known past. We visit the National Atomic Testing museum to learn about how the desert outside of Vegas was used for testing Americas secret nuclear weapons. We also visit the Mormon Fort, the first permanent non-native settlement in the area, as well as the Neon Museum.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Theres a lot to cover in the oldest city in America. Take a sip from the distinctively tasting Fountain of Youth. Then well cross the draw bridge of the undefeated Spanish Fort, the Castillo San Marcos. Then well learn the true history of pirates at the Pirate Museum.

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: Beyond the asteroid belt lay the ice giants, some can be seen with the naked eye, others only glimpsed once by a passing probe. We are again sending cameras to the edge of the solar system giving us new insights into the evolution of our worlds.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: These are the the Moons of the gas giants. Each a unique and mysterious world of its own. Some have oceans of water, geysers of Sulphur or atmospheres of plastic. Some are just now being seen at the outer rim of our solar system, all are worthy of much more scrutiny.

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. The worlds rooftops are a continual hive of activity…

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: Its the city of love, Paris, France. The world over knows its most famous structure, the Eiffel Tower! But did you know PARISIANS originally wanted to tear it down! Well explain why and how it was saved! Then, youll visit Americas FIRST PIZZERIA! And how the gourmet ice cream HAAGEN DAZS got its exotic start in Bronx New York!

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: Learn the secrets behind THERMOS amazing technology! And they were the sweet candy pellets we loved as a kid, but did you know that PEZ was created to help people stop smoking? And find out how a steamboat inspired SAMUEL LANGHORNE CLEMENS to change his name to MARK TWAIN!

programme.title: Water: H2O Stories
programme.desc: Water: H2O Stories is a 3x52 series revisiting the story of water on planet Earth and its disrupted course over time which has led to the 21st century biggest challenge.

programme.title: Blue Realm
programme.desc: Filmed using crystal clear High Definition technology, The Blue Realm takes the viewer on a fascinating and breath-taking journey of discovery beneath the waves to examine the unique biology and extraordinary behaviour of undersea animals. Filmed by expert divers with a passion for marine life and environment, the compelling stories and captivating creatures come from many locations around the world including Papua New Guinea, Palau, South Africa, the Red Sea, the Great Barrier Reef, the Bahamas, Cocos Island, British Columbia, Texas, Indonesia, the Socorro Archipelago, California and Florida.

programme.title: Blue Realm
programme.desc: Filmed using crystal clear High Definition technology, The Blue Realm takes the viewer on a fascinating and breath-taking journey of discovery beneath the waves to examine the unique biology and extraordinary behaviour of undersea animals.
