programme.title: Inside Outer Space
programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: Inside Outer Space
programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: A Year in the Wild
programme.desc: It is April, and large groups of blacktip and tiger sharks are gathering off the South African Coast. They are waiting for the onset of one of natures most spectacular mass migrations: the annual sardine run. Like the cold ocean current that gives rise to the extraordinary numbers of African pilchards and their predators during the Sardine Run, the frigid Benguela current that runs northwards along the arid coastline of Namibia also supports a remarkable diversity of life. Monk parakeets are highly sociable, quirky South American parrots, but unlike all other parrots, they build complex nesting structures that can reach the size of a car, with individual compartments for each nesting pair. South American parakeets arent the only birds turned architects: the social weaver birds of southern Africa also construct permanent nests on trees, large enough to house dozens of bird families, often stretching across several generations at a time. Like the weaverbirds, bats, too, tend to roost in large numbers. At this time of year, mothers and their young form part of the colony, with the young clinging closely to the front of their mothers until there are weaned at 6 months of age. In the Thong Pha Phoom National Park in Thailand, a pair of greater coucals have built a nest and laid a clutch of 4 eggs. By now, massive shoals of around 10 million Southern African Pilchards have gathered in the coastal waters of South Africa and begun their migration northwards. Like the dolphins during the Sardine Run, lions tend to work in teams when hunting large prey like buffalo. And right now, the need for the Xakanaxa pride to hunt and provide for their expanding family is greater than ever: they have new cubs to feed. A group of meerkats in South Africa is also busily caring for their growing family. Most of the clan has already left the family burrow to forage for insects and other small prey. In the Okavango Deltas grassland, a pair of puff adders is engaged in a lengthy mating ritual.

programme.title: Sarah Shark
programme.desc: Sarah travels to one of the top 10 dive destinations in Australia (Julian Rocks, Byron Bay, NSW) to dive with three species of Wobbegong Sharks within the Cape Byron Marine Park. She also conducts a street poll with members of the public to find out what they think about sharks.

programme.title: Sarah Shark
programme.desc: Sarah travels to one of the top 10 dive destinations in Australia (Julian Rocks, Byron Bay, NSW) to dive with three species of Wobbegong Sharks within the Cape Byron Marine Park. She also conducts a street poll with members of the public to find out what they think about sharks.

programme.title: Wild Australia with Ray Mears
programme.desc: Ray Mears explores the Great Barrier Reef starting on the Queensland mainland taking a boat out to Hervey Bay with whale expert Wally Franklin. They witness a mother hump back whale teaching her three month old calf the whale moves needed to survive the long migration to Antarctica.He flies out to Lady Elliot Island at the southernmost tip of the Great Barrier Reef where he goes scuba diving on the coral reef and discovers giant turtles and manta rays and shoals of big eyed trevelly fish.Back on the island Ray helps marine biologist Maggie ONeal plant a Pisonia tree and finds out how the Pisonia trees kill the Black Noddy birds that nest in them in order to use their corpses as a fertile compost given the unforgiving ground of a coral island.

programme.title: Wild Australia with Ray Mears
programme.desc: Ray Mears journeys into the remote wilderness region of Arnhem land to the Cooper Creek Billabong. Hes there during the dry season and all the wild life is concentrated into a narrow stretch of water. He comes face to face with the dominant saltwater crocodile and watches as the croc manoeuvres a dead pig down river to a secret hiding place. When Ray gets too close warns him off.Ray travels into Stone Country above the Billabong where he finds a gallery of ancient Aboriginal art and joins locals Connie Nayinggul and her grandson Moses on a fishing expedition. They catch a barramundi and cook the fish in a traditional ground oven using paper bark.Finally Ray travels with land manager Greg Towns across the dried up mudflats through giant flocks of Magpie Geese. Ray helps Greg to burn away large meadows of alien and destructive grass that is killing the birds. In a dramatic scene Ray witnesses the spectacle of farming with fire.

programme.title: Wild Australia with Ray Mears
programme.desc: In Victoria just south west of Melbourne in the You Yangs National Park Ray Mears meets up with researcher Janine Duffy in a dry eucalyptus forest. They go in search of koalas and find a young male who nervously tries to establish his own territory.Ray moves down to the open grasslands and tracks a mob of Eastern Grey kangaroos. He visits the Mount Rothwell Conservation Reserve and meets an unusual marsupial - a predator - that is almost extinct on the mainland of Australia - a Tiger Quoll - smaller relative of the Tasmanian Devil. Finally Ray journeys through a Wet Eucalyptus forest to Lake Elizabeth and canoeing across the quiet waters finds himself surrounded by rare and unique duck billed platypuses

programme.title: Animal Embassy
programme.desc: Federica the turtle has arrived from Italy after a run in with a container ship. Loro Parques offered to be her forever home, but how will she go sharing her new digs with others? Youve heard of a fish out of water - try a turtle! Esmeralda the iguana has a lumpy belly and Jorge the vet is worried. Hes hoping its a bounty of eggs but knows he shouldnt count his iguanas before they hatch. Its fingers crossed for some scaly babies!

programme.title: Animal Embassy
programme.desc: Hes known as the "Birdman of Loro Parque" and Rafa, the Loro Parque Foundation Scientific Director wears the badge with pride. Every day he surrounds himself with all things ornithological - from parrots and puffins to penguins. But its what hes carrying through the zoo that brings all the birds to the yard. Any guesses? Youve heard of the film "How to train your Dragon" - today Inaki has to try and train an anteater (and hes not sure whats proving easier)! With anteaters being the stubborn but sensitive types, Inakis digging deep into his bag of tricks - beginning with the old favourite, some vanilla yoghurt. Will Sue-Anne the anteater succumbs to Inakis tasty charms or will she thumb her (rather long) nose at him instead?

programme.title: WWII Documentary Films
programme.desc: Award-winning documentary films produced to enlighten future generations about the personal stories of the WWII generations.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: From the elite ex-special forces personnel in charge of guarding heads of state in conﬂ ict zones to the two-person teams that protect CEOs in dangerous regions, modern-day bodyguards must be well versed in close quarter battle techniques. An immense amount of planning and preparation is involved in each operation. From air travel, car convoys and helicopter shuttles to basic foot traﬃc, a close protection squad must be completely tuned to the Who, What, Where and When of any given situation. This episode of CQB focuses on the complex day-to-day and minute-to-minute operations of these elite teams and the highly developed techniques they employ.

programme.title: Wax in the City
programme.desc: Africa is in fashion! Its flag? Wax print, which more and more Franco-African designers are choosing to incorporate into their creations. Flora Coquerel, a Franco-Beninese woman and the winner of MissFrance 2014, invites us to follow them in their intense and globalised life for a success story - how the colours of a simple fabric have become the symbol of the cultural melting pot of an entire generation!

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: Learn the secrets behind THERMOS amazing technology! And they were the sweet candy pellets we loved as a kid, but did you know that PEZ was created to help people stop smoking? And find out how a steamboat inspired SAMUEL LANGHORNE CLEMENS to change his name to MARK TWAIN!

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Music Voyager

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: After the fall of the soviet union many countries remained in dispute in the early nineties despite eastern Europes independence. In 1994 a bitter conflict broke out between the forces of the Chechnen independence movement and the Russian regular army. Despite overwhelming manpower, weaponry and air support, the Russian forces were unable to establish effective permanent control over the mountainous area due to many successful Chechen guerrilla raids. Improvised Explosive Devices were one of the most effective methods employed in these disastrous raids and were the back drop to many Close Quarter Battle scenarios exchanged between the two sides.

programme.title: What In the World

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: Derek Acorahs The Past Hunters continue their investigation of Knutsford Crown Court. As they delve deeper into the building, will the ghosts and spirits make contact through Derek?

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: Carnfield Hall is a country house dating from the 15th and 16th Centuries. This private residence turn event hall is using its paranormal activity to draw in business. Are these spirits the old residents?

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: We travel to the end of the rainbow in Dublin, Ireland. Well gawk at the Book of Kells, a holy book displayed at Trinity College. We visited the hallowed halls of St. Patricks Cathedral, and touched famed Irishman, Daniel OConnells crypt at Glasnevin Cemetery. Finally, we learn the complicated history of Irish independence at Kilmainham jail.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: One of the 7 Natural Wonders of the World, Victoria Falls is an amazing spectacle that straddles the Zambia/Zimbabwe border. The force of the water is so intense that the water bouncing back creates a rainforest. Remarkably, the wildlife in the area is as abundant as the water going over the falls.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: Once a year in good rain years, the deserts of South Africa explode in color. This is the greatest flower bloom in the world. We venture into the desert to experience this first-hand and film the rare animals that call this arid land home.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: A visit to the Island of Tahiti together with a local called Alphonse who, as well as acquainting us with the famous canoe race Hawaiki Nui Vaa, he also takes us to the central market of Papeete and to visit inland Tahiti - with it green, lush hills and mountains and to show us the gifts of this land and the beauty of the Polynesian sea. We then go to Raiatea, the biggest island of French Polynesia, where on board a catamaran we dive to explore the Polynesian sea beds and sail along the coast to arrive to Taputapuatea, the largest Marae in Polynesia. The Marae are places of worship where the Gods are honored, and they are also important cultural, political and social centers, where they used to prepare for war, elect their leaders and also carry out human sacrifices. Finally we go to Motu Nao Nao to watch the sun go down, a small island, dotted here and there with coconut palms, lapped by the waters of the lagoon and surrounded by a ring of coral reef where the strong waves break over it, creating an amazing atmosphere.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: Five archipelagos covered by blooming vegetation and surrounded by crystal clear waters, such beauty has no equal. This is the paradise of Polynesia and what is waiting for us in the Rangiroa atoll? Here we discover the coral beaches, typical villages, wines, traditions and the ancient trades linked to fishing activities, together with the marine depths with its pure and intact reef. We dive into the passes that surround the lagoon, creeks that are full of marine life: napoleon fishes, grey sharks, parrot fishes, sea turtles. Until we see the real star of this sea: the bottlenose dolphin, swimming through the waves with fun and grace.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Its island living in the Keys on this episode of TTH. We learn about the islands treasure hunting history at the Mel Fisher Museum. Then well explore Fort Jefferson, an isolated fort in the Gulf of Mexico that defended the islands. American literature enthusiasts will enjoy a look at Ernest Hemingways Key West home, where some of his most famous works were penned.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: We head underground and visit the Hidee Gold Mine to see how this most precious material is obtained. Then we get a tour of the brand new History Colorado Center where well explore Colorados past through first hand stories and interactive attractions.

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Bill Ball breaks the rules and stereo types of travel shows as he ventures beyond the highlights. What do you do after youve lead groups to over 140 countries and all 7 continents? Welcome to Bills bucket list on steroids... Travel Quest. This new, fast-paced series chases Bill around the globe as he seeks out anything but the mundane and ordinary—coming face-to-face with the largest crocodiles in the world, snorkeling with thousands of jellyfish, walking on the rim of an exploding volcano, feeding a group of sharks without a cage, bicycling across the Serengeti... this is not your typical travel show!

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: Our solar system is vast, from our own star the Sun to Earth is nearly 150 million kilometers or 1 Astronomical Unit. Jupiter is 5.2 AU distant and Pluto up to 48AU, the solar system extends far beyond this into interstellar space. We humans cannot yet travel that sort of distance, however w e can and do send our robots and probes in our place; and the results are astounding.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: The question often rises is the cost of space exploration really worth it? Could the money be better spent elsewhere. If so one space program would have to remain. The planetary defence program, to locate identify and deflect a wayward asteroid from hitting Earth and destroying our civilzation because at last count there were 15,000 possible dangerous candidates close to Earth.

With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: In the Messinia region of Greece, we find a place of unbelievable beauty, where man has been able to really work for the conservation and defense of the eco-system there. It is the Navarino Coast, where "eco sustainability" has become the key word at the heart of every human activity, from building design to the choice of construction materials, from the irrigation techniques for the golf course to the sports activities, from the culinary tradition to diving. The communion with nature is complete, and the body can benefit from it in many different ways: for example, through the physiotherapy treatments based on herbs, or with SUP yoga, which is practiced directly on a board in the sea.

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: Its been sweetening America for almost 40 years! Now, find out the truth behind how SWEET N LOW actually got its name! And why do we yell SHOTGUN when getting into a car with friends? Then, is it really bad luck to open an umbrella in the house? And, learn the salty truth on how the POTATO CHIP was invented out of ANGER!

programme.title: Distant Shores
programme.desc: Series 9 of Distant Shores follows Paul and Sheryl Shard on a diverse voyage from England through the inland waterways of France to the Mediterranean Sea, an Atlantic crossing, and island-hopping in the Caribbean aboard their 49-foot sailboat, Distant Shores II. When they travel through France to arrive in the Med they sail to Gibraltar. From Gibraltar they enter the Atlantic Ocean stopping at the exotic port of Rabat on the west coast of Morocco, then head offshore to explore the Canary Islands before joining the Atlantic Rally for Cruisers (ARC) in Las Palmas for a 2,800 mile trans-atlantic passage to the Caribbean for Christmas celebrations.

programme.title: Diamond River Hunters
programme.desc: Peter and his team return to Lesotho once more to pursue their dreams of finding big diamonds. The rainy season is supposed to be over but they have to make their way down the dangerous mountain roads during a violent hailstorm. They setup the mining operation again after a 3 month break, but the machinery is rusted and they battle to get the TLB running. To combat the technical problems they had last time, a new team member has been recruited: Alan, a pump specialist. They have also brought up a bigger CAT earthmover and a Hopper has been specially constructed to turn over more ground. They have invested heavily in new machinery to try and increase productivity, but still face daily technical problems. The investors all have concerns about Gary, who is looking extremely thin and haggard after the break. They begin to suspect he may have a drug problem. The new CAT is delivered to the mining site, but it breaks down on the first day. Mining resumes once Kim and Alan get the pumps up and running, and the CAT is repaired by Warren. The rivers rise after heavy rains and the team are unable to cross the first river. The CAT becomes stuck trying to get up the riverbank. They try to dig their way out, but it doesnt work and the CAT becomes trapped in the river. A site for the hopper is found and it is a huge combined effort to get it assembled. As they complete the task, they are hit by a huge storm and a flash flood tears through the mining site. The miners scramble to save the machinery from being swept away by the rising water. Rob and Peter confront Gary about his work ethic and drug use. At first Gary denies this, but then admits that he has been using drugs. He is not in good shape and claims to be sick but Rob is convinced that his drug problem is keeping him from work. He is not aware that a decision has already been made to fire him. Warren takes it upon himself to break the bad news to Gary. He leaves after an emotional farewell with Warren. The inlet hose is fitted to the hopper and the team are optimistic about its ability to move more ground once it is operational. Peter has some luck at the sorting table and finds a small, but valuable diamond.

programme.title: Mongolia, Steppes Emirate
programme.desc: Battered by strong winds, and seen as a grazing land, Mongolia is the kingdom of steppes. With important mineral resources such as copper or uranium, coal and rare soil, Mongolia future is secure: the economy shows a significant growth rate and it is a business paradise for some expatriates. But for most of the population, needs remain unfulfilled.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: These are the the Moons of the gas giants. Each a unique and mysterious world of its own. Some have oceans of water, geysers of Sulphur or atmospheres of plastic. Some are just now being seen at the outer rim of our solar system, all are worthy of much more scrutiny.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Follow breathtaking travel adventures of some well known athletes of extreme sports. Have a look at some stunning locations in Alaska, Mexico, Argentina, Japan, Tahiti, Africa, Costa Rica, Norway, Hawaii and whitewater kayaking, extreme big mountain skiing, windsurfing, kiteboarding, extreme snowboarding and big wave surfing that push the limits of possibility. The focus is on compelling personalities and great storytelling.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Follow breathtaking travel adventures of some well known athletes of extreme sports. Have a look at some stunning locations in Alaska, Mexico, Argentina, Japan, Tahiti, Africa, Costa Rica, Norway, Hawaii and whitewater kayaking, extreme big mountain skiing, windsurfing, kiteboarding, extreme snowboarding and big wave surfing that push the limits of possibility. The focus is on compelling personalities and great storytelling.

programme.title: Brazils Coastlines
programme.desc: A series to celebrate Brazil and its diversity. We will explore the beauty and richness of the 8000 kilometer-long coasts, focusing on their natural and geographical aspects but also on its economic and cultural facets. An exciting journey blending the best aerial shots with stunning photography across the country to reveal both a cultural and human portrait.

programme.title: Brazils Coastlines
programme.desc: A series to celebrate Brazil and its diversity. We will explore the beauty and richness of the 8000 kilometer-long coasts, focusing on their natural and geographical aspects but also on its economic and cultural facets. An exciting journey blending the best aerial shots with stunning photography across the country to reveal both a cultural and human portrait.

programme.title: European Islands
programme.desc: Tenerife is the largest and most diverse of the seven Canary Island. It is home to Spains highest mountain - Pico del Teide with an elevation of nearly 4OOO meters. Tenerife includes an incredible ten defined climate zones!!! There are substantial differences between the north and the south of the island. The northern, windward side receives three fourths of all precipitation, which is why it is green year round. The significant differences in elevation also contribute to the great contrasts, as do the mountain ranges extending through the middle of the island. You can experience large differences in temperature on Tenerife, especially in the winter months- you can swim and sunbathe on the southern beaches, while its freezing and snowing on the summit of Teide.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Timber is one of this countrys biggest natural resources and the source of great potential wealth. Hence the existence of wholesale illegal logging, irrespective of the consequences to the local environment. This has led concerned parties to set up the Olancho Environmental Movement. This organization has mobilized to protect these forests, at some risk to its members, like Rene Gradiz, whose testimony is disturbing in the extreme.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Desperate Hours
programme.desc: Life on planet Earth is a fragile enough proposition as it is. The Earth is an interconnected system, everything is dependent on everything else, and we as a species should learn how to avoid making things worse than they need to be. In this rather sobering instalment of Desperate Hours our special focus is on Environmental Disasters. We will explore what has actually been done to protect the environment in contrast to the long discussions on this topic. From polluting the planet in various ways to the effects of global warming we contemplate how our future might be affected. As custodians of the planet, are we not better to be safe, rather than sorry?

programme.title: Desperate Hours
programme.desc: Volcanoes, earthquakes, tidal waves, and fires. Cataclysmic events that are capable of wiping out thousands of lives in a terribly short space of time. Then there are epidemics and pandemics, particularly chilling in their own way, because they literally and figuratively get under the skin. Lets not forget man-made disasters, the industrial accidents and environmental disasters that highlight all that is worst about our presence on this fragile blue green planet. And what is more frightening than a nuclear calamity? Accidents on the road, on rail, in the air and at sea, well, may not have quite the same deadly power as volcanoes or earthquakes; but they hold their own terrors, and are responsible for 1000s of fatalities every year. In this sobering yet thrilling final instalment of Desperate Hours we will take a look at some of the worst of the worst.

programme.title: Fragrance and Emotions
programme.desc: Unique documentary that takes you to discover the secret of some of the most luxurious perfumes and emblematic fragrances in the world. Visit the famous city of Grasse to meet the creators, the beautiful flower fields and all the incredible emotional powers of the Perfume.

programme.title: Yemen, Chaos in Silence
programme.desc: After three years of war, Yemen is facing its worst humanitarian crisis since the end of World War II. Yemen, chaos in silence"" is an unprecedented journey that tells the story of a conflict that is unfolding virtually without outside witnesses. From Aden in the south to Sanaa in the north, via Taez, the front line, this film explores a devastated country, eroded by political and religious divisions and ravaged by cholera.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Music Voyager

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: The history of the British Empire colonial legacy in Northern Ireland is well known the world over but a there is a largely untold story of the the firefights between and close quarter battles exchanged between the provisional IRA, the British army and the elite SAS. Although the IRA often employed "terrorist" techniques within the city of london and on Englands mainland not much is said of the often guerilla warfare techniques of the British Special Air Service in Northern Ireland since the beginning of this conflict. In this episode we will examine how the history of the Special Air Service affected the training of every elite force after it and how the close quarter battles in Northern Ireland in the late 1970s through to the millennium shaped both special forces and resistance methods.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Džeremijs un Saša izskata iespējamu nepatiesu atzīšanos, kas noveda pie Viljama Burtforta pakāršanas par Frānsisas Levinas brutālo slepkavību viņas Mančestras mājā 1933. gadā.

programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Brutāla vīrieša un sievietes slepkavība Talsā. Divus gadus vecs bērns tiek atstāts automašīnas sēdeklītī, bet piecgadīgs bērns tiek atstāts pavadīt nakti uz parka soliņa.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Detektīvi izmeklē divu ģimenes locekļu dubultslepkavību Mineapolē, aicinot liecinieku attaisnot notikušo. Jauna sieviete tiek atrasta atkritumu konteinerā mirusi - viņa uzzinājusi par sava līgavaiņa likteni.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Talsā tiek nošauts pa ielu braucošs vīrietis. Kāds dāsns Atlantas iedzīvotājs tiek noslepkavots savās mājās, un detektīvs Džons Egberts aizdomājas, ka viņš varētu būt savas laipnības upuris.

programme.title: Slepkavība brīvdienās
programme.desc: Vīrietis, kurš valkā vilka masku, Helovīnā nodūra sievieti un viņas nedzimušo bērnu. Izmeklētājiem ir jānomierina sabiedrība un jāatrod slepkava, pirms viņš uzbrūk atkal.

programme.title: Slepkavība brīvdienās
programme.desc: Jauna sieviete, kas ieradusies mājās no koledžas, tiek nogalināta un viņas nonāvēšanas rīki izrādās rullītis un grebšanas nazis, ko ģimene plānoja izmantot Pateicības dienas vakariņās. Izmeklētājiem ir grūti atrisināt šīs svētku šausmas.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Pēc mīļota Kvīnsas geja brutālās slepkavības kopiena sapulcējas, kamēr Ņujorkas policijas izmeklētāji slepenā misijā medī slepkavas.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Austrumhārlemā ikviens pazina Džeisonu Adamsu. Kad viņš tiek atrasts nodurts, pārbiedētajai sabiedrībai rodas tikai viens jautājums - kurš gan varēja vēlēties viņa nāvi? Izmeklētāji ir satriekti, un tikai negaidīta avota padoms palīdz sākt šķetināt šo slepkavību.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Talantīgā māksliniece Dženifera Stāla un četri viņas draugi tiek atrasti nošauti virs Ņujorkas ikoniskās Kārnegijas Deli teātru rajonā. Kad parādās šīs ziņas, visa pilsēta baidās, ka brīvībā atrodas aukstasinīgs slepkava.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Divi slīpēti noziedznieku advokāti atkārtoti izmeklē Alfrēda Mūra tiesas prāvu, notiesāšanu un nāvessodu par divu policistu nošaušanu policijas kordonā, kas ieskāva viņa lauku māju 1951. gadā.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Komanda atkārtoti izskata lietu par pēdējo Ņūkāslas cietumā pakārto personu - Džonu Dikmanu. Vietējais bukmeikers tika notiesāts par vīrieša nošaušanu vilcienā.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: slepkavas noķeršana
programme.desc: Šķietami nejaušā mājas ugunsgrēkā iet bojā sieviete, bet viens no policistiem pamana pazīmes, kas liecina, ka ir noticis kas draudīgāks.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: slepkavas noķeršana
programme.desc: Viņas mātes slepkavības izmeklēšanā viņas mājās 1994. gadā policija izmantoja kriminālistikas pavedienus, lai atrastu šausminošu slepkavu.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: slepkavas noķeršana
programme.desc: Vērojiet, kā izmeklētāji atklāja vainīgo aiz vecmāmiņas slepkavības 1994. gadā autoostas tualetē Burijā.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Šī sērija atklāj nelegālās cilvēku tirdzniecības pasauli.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Elitāra privātskola tiek kritizēta par gadu desmitiem senām apsūdzībām par audzēkņu seksuālu izmantošanu, ko veic tās darbinieki. Kā pieaugs upuru un vainīgo skaits? Un cik dziļa bija šo faktu piesegšana?

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Atlantā pusaudža dzīve pārtrūkst kaimiņu konflikta dēļ. Talsā pazūd jauna sieviete, un viņas ģimene baidās, ka viņa ir noslepkavota.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Vidusskolas futbolists tiek nošauts, jo viņa draugi pieņem bīstamu lēmumu.

programme.title: Slepkavība brīvdienās
programme.desc: Reaģējot uz laupīšanu sporta preču veikalā Ziemassvētku vakarā, Teksasas štata Ērvingas pilsētas policists tiek aukstasinīgi nošauts. Tiek atklāta slepkavu identitāte, un lieta pārvēršas valsts mēroga medībās.

programme.title: Slepkavība brīvdienās
programme.desc: Koledžas studente atrasta mirusi ceļa malā pēc Jaungada ballītes viņas dzimtajā pilsētā Fillmorā, Kalifornijā. Izmeklētāji kā vienu no iespējām izskata, ka slepkava varētu būt viens no daudzajiem ballīšu apmeklētājiem, kas sagaidīja Jauno gadu.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Trīs radinieki plāno nāvējošu atriebības plānu, jo viņu brālis tiek notiesāts par slepkavību, taču lietas izmainās, kad, izrādās, viņu mērķis ir nepareizā persona.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Masu apšaudē Čelsijā ir viens bojāgājušais un trīs ievainotie. Izmeklētāji atklāj, ka šī ir jaunākā slepkavību sērija, kas aptver vairākus iecirkņus. Izmeklētāji nonāk Ņujorkas pazemes pasaulē.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Ņujorkas policijas izmeklētāji sacenšas, lai atklātu dīvaino savējā slepkavību, pirms viltīgais slepkava izslīd no valsts.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: 1922. gadā Edīte Tompsone un viņas mīļākais notiesāts par viņas vīra Persija brutālo slepkavību. 2017. gadā viņas māsīca Nikija apšauba, cik pārliecinoša bija sākotnējā sodāmība.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Saša un Džeremijs atkārtoti izmeklē 1900. gada slepkavības lietu Jarmutā. Pludmalē mirusi tika atrasta sieviete, kura ar pieņemtu vārdu apmetās piejūras kūrortā.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Džeremijs un Saša izskata iespējamu nepatiesu atzīšanos, kas noveda pie Viljama Burtforta pakāršanas par Frānsisas Levinas brutālo slepkavību viņas Mančestras mājā 1933. gadā.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: slepkavas noķeršana
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad sirmmāmiņa tiek nožņaugta līdz nāvei mazdārziņa šķūnī, policija izmanto notikuma vietas kriminālistikas pavedienus, lai atrisinātu stindzinošo gadījumu.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: slepkavas noķeršana
programme.desc: Savās mājās noslepkavotās nedzirdīgās sievietes Sūzenas Grīnhilas lieta, kuras slepkavība tiesu medicīnas izmeklētājus izvazāja meklējumos pa visu Eiropu.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Balto pārākuma dusmas mudina kādu jaunekli 2015. gadā Čārlstonā noslepkavot deviņus melnādainus baznīcas apmeklētājus. Tas motivē izraisīt sprādzienu un nogalināt musulmaņu bēgļus Kanzasā. Varas iestādes vēlas zināt, ar ko tas beigsies.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Politiskā kandidāta meita Peru pazūd pēc nakts dzīves Limā. Vīrietis, ar kuru viņa pēdējo reizi redzēta dzīva, ir saistīts ar jaunas amerikānietes pazušanu 3000 jūdžu attālumā. Kādas nelietīgas shēmas dalībnieks ir šis vīrietis?

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Kāda sieviete, kurai koledžā uzbrucis vīrietis, apņemas saukt viņu pie atbildības. Pēc trīsdesmit gadiem tās pašas universitātes students stāsta par sastapšanos ar pārsteidzošām līdzībām. Izmeklētāji atklāj šokējošu patiesību.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Atlantā pusaudža dzīve pārtrūkst kaimiņu konflikta dēļ. Talsā pazūd jauna sieviete, un viņas ģimene baidās, ka viņa ir noslepkavota.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Vidusskolas futbolists tiek nošauts, jo viņa draugi pieņem bīstamu lēmumu.

programme.title: Slepkavība brīvdienās
programme.desc: Reaģējot uz laupīšanu sporta preču veikalā Ziemassvētku vakarā, Teksasas štata Ērvingas pilsētas policists tiek aukstasinīgi nošauts. Tiek atklāta slepkavu identitāte, un lieta pārvēršas valsts mēroga medībās.

programme.title: Slepkavība brīvdienās
programme.desc: Koledžas studente atrasta mirusi ceļa malā pēc Jaungada ballītes viņas dzimtajā pilsētā Fillmorā, Kalifornijā. Izmeklētāji kā vienu no iespējām izskata, ka slepkava varētu būt viens no daudzajiem ballīšu apmeklētājiem, kas sagaidīja Jauno gadu.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Trīs radinieki plāno nāvējošu atriebības plānu, jo viņu brālis tiek notiesāts par slepkavību, taču lietas izmainās, kad, izrādās, viņu mērķis ir nepareizā persona.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Masu apšaudē Čelsijā ir viens bojāgājušais un trīs ievainotie. Izmeklētāji atklāj, ka šī ir jaunākā slepkavību sērija, kas aptver vairākus iecirkņus. Izmeklētāji nonāk Ņujorkas pazemes pasaulē.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Ņujorkas policijas izmeklētāji sacenšas, lai atklātu dīvaino savējā slepkavību, pirms viltīgais slepkava izslīd no valsts.

programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls nožēlo, ka atklājis ziņas par Stenlija romānu, tāpēc viņš izplata virkni melu par visiem pārējiem, lai slēptu savas pēdas. Izrādās, viens no viņa izplatītajiem meliem patiesībā izrādās patiess.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls sabotē — un pēc tam atbalsta — Džima centienus iegūt paaugstinājumu, savukārt Dvaits un Tobijs mēģina pierādīt, ka Derils ir iesniedzis krāpniecisku medicīnisku izziņu.

programme.title: Ofiss

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Birojs devies uz Niagāras ūdenskritumu, lai svinētu Džima un Pemas kāzas saskaņā ar stingrām pavēlēm nerunājot par Pemas grūtniecību. Maikls, Dvaits un Endijs vēlas saieties ar viesiem kāzās.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Jauns futbolists Mets no Polk High, kur Kellija un Bads mācās skolā, apdraud divus Bandiju rekordus: vienu, kas pieder Alam par visvairāk piezemējumiem vienā sezonā, un otru - Kellijai. Kellija vēlas kļūt par Polk High komandas karsējmeiteni, lai pievērstu Meta uzmanību lielajā sezonas noslēguma spēlē.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Stīvs, Mārsija un Bandiji dodas uz namiņu mežā, taču jautrību aptur Kellijas PMS. Vīrieši aizbrauc, lai dotos makšķerēt un atgrieztos pie visām trim sievietēm, kurām ir menstruācijas un naidīgs noskaņojums. Kad lācis uzbrūk automašīnai, Als jautri mēģina viņu apturēt.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Kamerona tētis ierodas ciemos no fermas, un, kad Džejs pienāk ciemos, divi vīrišķīgi vīrieši strīdas.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte

programme.title: Ofiss

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls ir sarūgtināts, jo viņš kļūst par visu biroja joku pēc tam, kad viņš iekrīt zivju dīķī. Endijs un Pema kopā dodas tirgot papīru, un visi viņus uzskata par precētu pāri.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Pema ir jo dusmīgāka uz Maiklu, kad viņš ar viņas mammu izšķiras viņas dzimšanas dienā, jo viņš uzzinājis, ka viņai ir 58 gadi. Dvaits neveiksmīgi cenšas panākt, ka visi biroja darbinieki būtu parādā viņam kādu pakalpojumu.

programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Izmisušie Als un Stīvs liek kopā galvas, meklējot risinājumus gaidāmajai plikpaurībai. Stīvs sāk pamanīt savu matu līniju atkāpšanos, savukārt Alam tas ir pilnīgi vienalga. Neveiksmīgi izmēģinājis matu toniku, Stīvs mēģina pievienoties plikpaurīgo vīriešu klubam Bald American Dudes (B.A.D.) un atved sev līdzi Alu, kurš rīko tikšanos apavu veikalā.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Pēc sava ilggadējā friziera nāves Als palaiž brīvībā savus matus, nevis pacieš vizīti pie jauna stilista salonā... kurā strādā sievietes. Kad Als padodas un dodas uz salonu, viņam izveido ļoti sliktu frizūru, kas liek viņam izskatīties pēc sievietes.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Pēc sava ilggadējā friziera nāves Als palaiž brīvībā savus matus, nevis pacieš vizīti pie jauna stilista salonā... kurā strādā sievietes. Kad Als padodas un dodas uz salonu, viņam izveido ļoti sliktu frizūru, kas liek viņam izskatīties pēc sievietes.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Izmisušie Als un Stīvs liek kopā galvas, meklējot risinājumus gaidāmajai plikpaurībai. Stīvs sāk pamanīt savu matu līniju atkāpšanos, savukārt Alam tas ir pilnīgi vienalga. Neveiksmīgi izmēģinājis matu toniku, Stīvs mēģina pievienoties plikpaurīgo vīriešu klubam Bald American Dudes (B.A.D.) un atved sev līdzi Alu, kurš rīko tikšanos apavu veikalā.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Bandiji dodas uz greznu restorānu, lai iztērētu lielu naudu — mantojuma čeku par 237 dolāriem no Pegijas tēvoča. Taču kļūst acīmredzams, ka izsmalcinātas pusdienas sabiedriskās vietās nav daļa no disfunkcionālo Bandiju dzīvesveida. Situācija pasliktinās, kad Als aizmirst paņemt līdzi maku.

programme.title: Women at War
programme.desc: Agneses klosteris ir pārveidots par kara hospitāli, Margerita meklē darbu vietējā bordelī, Suzanna bēg uz Šveici ar Žannas palīdzību.

programme.title: Women at War
programme.desc: Francija, 1914. g. Stāsts par četrām sievietēm - Parīzes prostitūtu Margeritu, ģimenes galvu Karolīnu, klostera galveno māsu Agnesi un feministiski noskaņoto māsu Suzannu.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Detektīvs Albergs izmeklē divu sieviešu noslēpumaino nāvi. Abas tika atrastas mežā dīvainās pozās.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Kad mis Mārpla uzzina par biznesmeņa Reksa Forteskjū, viņa sievas Adeles un kalpones Gledisas nāvi, apstākļi spilgti atbilst kādam bērnu skaitāmpantiņam.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Attālā Francijas viesnīcā Elīza seko kādam krāpniekam. Viņa uzskata, ka beidzot ir notvērusi Skotlendjarda vismeklētāko noziedznieku. Tomēr arī citi viesnīcas viesi vēlas saņemt solīto atlīdzību.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Ziemassvētku laikā Zigfrīdam ir jāizlemj, vai uz Riveras labklājības rēķina aizstāvēt Tristanu, bet Holas kundze saprot, ka ir jātiek galā ar savām jūtām pret Džeraldu.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Ir 1940. gada pavasaris, un Skeldeilas namā visus gaida pārmaiņas. Džeimss un Helēna prāto, kad pienāks īstais brīdis ģimenes pieaugumam, nezinot, vai Džeimsu iesauks armijā vai ne. Tristana prombūtni sajūt visi, bet visskarbāk Zigfrīds, kurš cenšas uzturēt pieaugošo mājsaimniecību un braši turēties gaidāmo izaicinājumu priekšā. Uzplaukst Holas kundzes un Helēnas draudzība, abas lūkojas nākotnē. Un ierodas jauns veterinārijas students Ričards Kārmondijs, radot ķibeles mājā.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Džeims dodas mājās, lai izmeklētu bērnības drauga slepkavību. Peregrīna iejaucas izmeklēšanā, kas uzplēš senas Džeimsa brūces.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Džeimsam beidzot veicas ar Zemkopības ministrijas TB testēšanas shēmu, un Tristans dodas uz randiņu ar Sigfrīda ienaidnieka meitu Florenci Pandi.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Zigfrīds un Tristans kļūst par atbildīgajiem, kad Holas kundze dodas projām, lai tiktos ar kādu svarīgu personu no pagātnes. Dženija atklāj Helēnai, ka viņa pieņēmusi nozīmīgu lēmumu par nākotni.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Kad radio tiek ziņots, ka Lielbritānija drīz iesaistīsies karā, Džeimss atklāj tuberkulozes gadījumu Hestongreindžā, bet Ričards lūdz par to neziņot ministrijai.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Ziemassvētku laikā Zigfrīdam ir jāizlemj, vai uz Riveras labklājības rēķina aizstāvēt Tristanu, bet Holas kundze saprot, ka ir jātiek galā ar savām jūtām pret Džeraldu.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Kad bagāts baronets viens pats nomirst savā istabā dienu pirms kāzām, Džūdita, Beka un Sjūzija jau atkal nonāk aizraujoša noslēpuma epicentrā.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Detektīvs Albergs izmeklē divu sieviešu noslēpumaino nāvi. Abas tika atrastas mežā dīvainās pozās.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Muzeja direktors Markuss Dupeins cenšas pārliecināt brāli Nevilu parakstīt muzeja jauno īres līgumu. Muzejs ir ģimenes mantojums. Automašīnai aizdegoties, Nevils pēkšņi mirst.

programme.title: Forsaiti
programme.desc: Džoilons un Soames Forsaiti cīnās par ģimenes firmas mantošanas tiesībām. Notikumu ķēde apdraud viņu dzīves stabilitāti, un viņiem nākas izvēlēties starp pienākumu un sirdi.

programme.title: Grāmattārps
programme.desc: Nācijas mīļākais TV pāris Sandra Dāre un Stjuarts Hovards ir ieradušies Erceņģeļa ielā, lai filmētu savu pēdējo filmu, bet statisti nomirst pēc trupai paredzētas saindētas šokolādes apēšanas.

programme.title: Endavers
programme.desc: Endavers uniformā apsargā tukšu zemes pleķi laukos. Kad viņš atrod pazudušas skolnieces līķi, iesaistās Kāstlgeitas kriminālizmeklēšanas departaments, kur strādā Tērsdejs.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Kad mis Mārpla uzzina par biznesmeņa Reksa Forteskjū, viņa sievas Adeles un kalpones Gledisas nāvi, apstākļi spilgti atbilst kādam bērnu skaitāmpantiņam.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Nejaušas satikšanās laikā mis Pinkertona pastāsta mis Mārplai, ka dodas uz Skotlendjardu, lai ziņotu par slepkavību. Mis Mārpla vēlāk izlasa, ka mis Pinkertona ir gājusi bojā traģiskā negadījumā.

programme.title: Grāmattārps
programme.desc: Nācijas mīļākais TV pāris Sandra Dāre un Stjuarts Hovards ir ieradušies Erceņģeļa ielā, lai filmētu savu pēdējo filmu, bet statisti nomirst pēc trupai paredzētas saindētas šokolādes apēšanas.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Peregrīna uzņemas vairāk, nekā spēj paveikt, izmeklējot slepkavību starptautiskā kulinārijas skolā, atklājot korupcijas labirintu, kas ved atpakaļ uz Melburnas policiju.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad Greiema Kinga sieva Šērlija tiek noslepkavota sprādzienā, kas gandrīz prasa arī Peregrīnas dzīvību, izmeklēšana uzkarst un atklāj krāpniecisku darbību labirintu.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad slavenais Peregrīnas ēkas arhitekts tiek atrasts miris saunā kopā ar cita vīrieša sievu, Peregrīna un Džeims uzskata, ka greizsirdīgais vīrs varētu būt vainojams slepkavībā.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Peregrīnas prieks par gaidāmajām kāzām ātri beidzas, kad stjuaršu apmācības laikā tiek atklāts mirušas sievietes ķermenis.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Kad mis Mārpla uzzina par biznesmeņa Reksa Forteskjū, viņa sievas Adeles un kalpones Gledisas nāvi, apstākļi spilgti atbilst kādam bērnu skaitāmpantiņam.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Slavens burvju mākslinieks ir kā iekritis akā. Visa Londona apspriež šo noslēpumu, un kāda avīze nolīgst Elīzu veikt izmeklēšanu, neskatoties uz to, ka pie šīs lietas jau strādā Hercogs.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: 1850-tie gadi: bezbailīgā un ziņkārīgā Miss Skārleta vada tēva detektīvaģentūru ar inspektora Velingtona (Hercoga), kalpones Aivijas un Mozus palīdzību.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Attālā Francijas viesnīcā Elīza seko kādam krāpniekam. Viņa uzskata, ka beidzot ir notvērusi Skotlendjarda vismeklētāko noziedznieku. Tomēr arī citi viesnīcas viesi vēlas saņemt solīto atlīdzību.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Zoja Strahana satiek brāli Bendžaminu, kurš apgalvo, ka viņam esot finansiālas problēmas. Kad tiek atklāts Bendžaminam līdzīgs līķis, Albergs uzsāk slepkavas meklējumus.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Albergs un Gibsonas policijas nodaļa strādā, lai atrastu vainīgo, kad Kasandra nonāk dzīvībai bīstamā situācijā.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Detektīvs Albergs izmeklē divu sieviešu noslēpumaino nāvi. Abas tika atrastas mežā dīvainās pozās.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdokam ir aizdomas, ka kāda vīra nāve ir saistīta ar līdzekļu izšķērdēšanu hidroelektrostacijas projektā.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdoks zina, ka Takera slepkavību organizēja Tonijs Petruči, tomēr situāciju saasina gangstera bēgšana.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdoks un Krebtrijs piedalās kaujas rekonstrukcijā, kuras laikā tiek nogalināts viens no tās dalībniekiem.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mēdoks pārceļas uz pansiju, kur kāds dīvains īrnieks pieprasa, lai Mērdoks palīdz izmeklēt ēkā notikušu slepkavību.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad Krebtrijs un Efija ierodas uz Dikensa dzimšanas dienas svinībām, mājastēvs tiek atrasts miris.

programme.title: Forsaiti
programme.desc: Džoilons un Soames Forsaiti cīnās par ģimenes firmas mantošanas tiesībām. Notikumu ķēde apdraud viņu dzīves stabilitāti, un viņiem nākas izvēlēties starp pienākumu un sirdi.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Dalgliešs dodas uz reliģisku skolu Rietumsaseksā, lai izmeklētu garīdznieka nāvi. Viņš atklāj, ka gandrīz neviens viņu necieta un ka vairāki liecinieki melo.

programme.title: Women at War
programme.desc: Agneses klosteris ir pārveidots par kara hospitāli, Margerita meklē darbu vietējā bordelī, Suzanna bēg uz Šveici ar Žannas palīdzību.

programme.title: Women at War
programme.desc: Francija, 1914. g. Stāsts par četrām sievietēm - Parīzes prostitūtu Margeritu, ģimenes galvu Karolīnu, klostera galveno māsu Agnesi un feministiski noskaņoto māsu Suzannu.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Muzeja direktors Markuss Dupeins cenšas pārliecināt brāli Nevilu parakstīt muzeja jauno īres līgumu. Muzejs ir ģimenes mantojums. Automašīnai aizdegoties, Nevils pēkšņi mirst.

programme.title: Domina
programme.desc: Gaja valdīšanas laiks, par kuru stāsta viņa sieva Līvija Drusilla, kura pilnībā mainīja izpratni par to, ko sievietes varētu gaidīt no dzīves, jo viņa kļuva par pasaules ietekmīgāko sievieti.

programme.title: Domina
programme.desc: Kad pēkšņi tiek izsludināta amnestija, Līvija, kura gaida bērnu, atgriežas Romā, lai atgūtu ģimenes bagātības un izglābtu draugu, pavedinot Gaju, lai gan viņu iepriekšējās laulības vēl nav šķirtas.

programme.title: Premier League. Tottenham Hotspur - Aston Villa
Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Двое над пропастью
programme.desc: В центре сюжета Рита Кушнир, которая перед свадьбой застает своего жениха Олега со своей сестрой. Свадьба отменяется, а у Риты в жизни начинается череда запутанных событий, когда она случайно спасает от самоубийства неизвестного мужчину.

programme.title: When Do We Eat?
programme.desc: A familys Passover gets screwy after the patriarch unknowingly ingests a hit of Ecstasy.

programme.title: Deserter
programme.desc: Unlikely friends in a melting pot of confusion. Simon Murray fights for the French Foreign Legion. Pascal Dupont fights for himself. War torn men question honour, hope, morality...because you can desert everything...except yourself.

programme.title: Summer Dreams
programme.desc: Seventeen-year old Robbie Zirpollo has a problem. As the film opens, his mother is driving him to his new summer job. We learn that Robbie has grown up in Oceanside, California, but now he and his mother have moved to Colorado for a fresh start, as his father has taken the familys savings and his secretary to Mexico. Robbies mom has, through an uncle, gotten him a summer job at Water World on the grounds crew. The adventure begins when Robbie meets Alex and gets moved to Aokees Surf and Snack shack to work. Alex convinces Robbie to enter the parks "Employee Olympics" to bring the Surfer King trophy to its rightful place among the concessions crew. Tiffany, the park owners daughter, has other ideas for Robbie.

programme.title: Nico the Unicorn
programme.desc: A 12-year-old disabled boy, whose father recently passed away, has his life changed when the pony he rescues gives birth to a unicorn. Can he save the unicorn from the people who want to exploit it?

programme.title: House of the Stone Monkeys
programme.desc: The action proceeds along two tracks and two time frames. We meet the boy, who lives with his mother in a Budapest apartment house, in the summer of 2012. Another boy is spending his vacation with his grandparents in the same building in the summer of 1982. The house unveils its mysterious secret to both of them.

programme.title: Scout Camp
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old York Hayes, leader of the Fire Dragon Scout Troops, returns to Camp Rahuta for his final scout camp. York has decided to take the best step of his life.

programme.title: True Smile
programme.desc: Sergio, a 26-year-old autistic male is blind and has never seen a smile. He does, however, give everybody a sincere smile every day. A documentary based on the amazing story encapsulated by Sergio Aznarez Rosados life.

programme.title: Field of Lost Shoes
programme.desc: Based on a true story of the American Civil War, culminating at the Battle of New Market, May 1864. A group of teenage cadets sheltered from war at the Virginia Military Institute must confront the horrors of an adult world when they are called upon to defend the Shenandoah Valley. Leaving behind their youth, these cadets must decide what they are fighting for.

programme.title: I Could Never Be Your Woman
programme.desc: A mother falls for a younger man while her daughter falls in love for the first time. Mother Nature messes with their fates.

programme.title: The Phantom Father
programme.desc: The Phantom Father tells a story of an American professor Robert Traum, who takes a sabbatical from his teaching job to trace his roots in Romania. Traum soon discovers that he comes from a wealthy family involved in organized crime. He manages to reestablish contact with the sole remaining link to his otherwise deceased family—Sami. Rocco Castoro, the editor-in-chief of VICE magazine called the movie the best Romanian movie hes ever seen.

programme.title: The Zodiac
programme.desc: THE ZODIAC takes a different look at the famous Zodiac Killer case from other screen treatments of the murders. More than a simple crime story, the film is an emotional thriller focusing on the murders impact on victims, their families and the wider community. The film follows a police detective and his son who become obsessed with the murders and endanger their family in the process.

programme.title: Hangman
programme.desc: A fisherman discovers an abandoned sailboat and decides to board. He finds no signs of life, but when he gets back on deck his own boat appears to have disappeared. What follows is an absolute nightmare.

programme.title: The Cooler
programme.desc: In an old school Las Vegas casino, its top gambling jinx breaks his curse when he falls in love, much to his boss consternation.

programme.title: 4Got10
programme.desc: Brian Barnes (Johnny Messner) wakes up in the desert wounded and with no memory and no idea why hes surrounded by eight bodies, a van with four million in cash and a van full of cocaine. Brian is pursued by not only notorious drug lord Danny Perez (Danny Trejo) who desperately want his money back, and DEA Agent Rooker (Dolph Lundgren), but also a by the corrupt Sheriff Olson (Michael Pare) who will stop at nothing to get his hand on the new found fortune. On the run, Brian discovers the more he remembers the less he wants to know about who he really is.

programme.title: The Old Man and the Gun
The Lucky Dragon
programme.desc: A young, Chinese dragon punished by the gods to be a mere mortal is cast down to earth. He is forced to make his way in a strange land until the evil forces discover his true identity. Take part in a world full of imagination while following the journey of a mischievous dragon who has been transformed by magic into a little boy and exiled from his home to live among humans. When both good and evil forces learn that a dragon has arrived, they look for him as he is the only one who can find the magical sword—whose owner can rule the universe! Will he find the sword in time before it gets into the wrong hands? Will he ever become a dragon again?

programme.title: Train Master
programme.desc: 62 year old Jeremiah Wilson is truly the Train Master of Willamette Western Railroad. He lives, breaths, and eats railroad. When Brett Banner, 32 year old heir to New York Eastern talks his dad into purchasing Willamette Western, there is immediately a clash between himself and Jeremiah. Jeremiah is fired by Brett two years from retirement and turns into a angry, depressed grandfather. When Bretts nine year old son Justin realizes Jeremiahs grandson Thomas can drive a locomotive, he kidnaps and holds Thomas favorite dinosaur ransom. Justin, Thomas and 3 other children board an old engine in for repairs and accidentally turns it into runaway engine causing a chain reaction of events.

programme.title: Raspberry Magic
programme.desc: "Raspberry Magic" is a coming-of-age story about 11-year-old Monica Shah, who thinks she must win the science fair in order to bring her father back after he runs out on the family. She blames herself for her parents problems, and takes charge when her mother falls into a deep depression. Set behind the backdrop of a beautiful forest, Monicas experiment uses touch therapy to help raspberries grow faster. She asks, is it nature or nurture that can truly help a being grow? Does it even matter? Through her ups and downs with her family, she learns that its a complex question, and the answer isnt so simple.

programme.title: The Adventure Scouts
programme.desc: A coming of age movie about a group of boys and girls called "adventure scouts" who return from a camping trip to discover their small town is being held captive by a gang of motorcycle-riding knuckleheads. Using only their scouting knowledge and camping equipment, the kids take down the gang members one by one, reunite with family members, and restore the communitys sense of pride.

programme.title: No Limit Kids
programme.desc: Ashton, Celeste, and Becca are three unlikely middle school outcasts who form a club in an abandoned theater. There, they meet Charlie (Bill Cobbs, Night at the Museum), a homeless man who shares their passion for musical theater. When the theater is scheduled to be torn down, the teenagers set out to save the landmark with a modern-day performance of Shakespeares Much Ado About Nothing. Along the way, the group learns to treat others with respect and stand up for their beliefs. This Dove-approved film also features Emmy and Golden Globe nominee Lee Meriwether.

programme.title: Answer Me
programme.desc: A drama from 2004 produced in Italy, the script of which was based on the novel by Susanna Tamaro. A couple in love gets married, but when their first-born son comes to the world, the life of a young couple turns into hell.

programme.title: One More Time
programme.desc: Lucia is an aging Italian actress and director (beautifully portrayed by Antonionis and Fellinis actress Lucia Bosa), decides to come back to the small town where she had spent her happy childhood. She wants to bring the TV where television has never been seen before. She reaches out to the women in the local community with a project that might change their lives forever.

programme.title: Almost Friends
programme.desc: Charlie, a culinary genius, has lost the motivation. He doesnt know what to with his life anymore, but he knows one thing - get close to Amber. In comparison to her boyfriend, he seems to be totally unattractive, but Charlies closest friend convinces him that where theres a will theres a way.

programme.title: Land Of the Blind
programme.desc: A soldier recounts his relationship with a famous political prisoner attempting to overthrow their countrys authoritarian government.

programme.title: Miss Nobody
programme.desc: Unlucky in love, living at home with her eccentric mom, and stuck in a dead end secretarial job at Judge Pharmaceuticals, Sarah Jane longs for more out of life. Her surprise promotion to junior executive appears to be just the ticket. But with promotion comes a competitive new world of wily, complicated executives, and Sarah Jane begins to eliminate the competition the only way she knows how - murder. During her climb to the top, she unexpectedly falls for the man of her dreams, Detective Bill Malloy - the cop intent on cracking the case of the mysterious deaths at Judge Pharmaceuticals.

programme.title: The Groomsmen
programme.desc: A groom (Ed Burns) and his four attendants wrestle with issues related to friendship and maturity a week before the big day.

programme.title: Talea
programme.desc: Summertime. Everybody is excited to go on vacation to Italy. Everybody but Jasmin. Jasmin is yearning something. She wants to be with Eva, her mother, from whom she had to live seperately for a long time. For weeks, Jasmin is trying to get close to Eva. She does not give up, even if shes rejected. After an argument, Jasmin runs away from her fosterhome and convinces Eva to leave the city together and go on a trip. The two get closer -- sometimes as friends, sometimes as mother and daughter. A first joint cigarette, a dance in the village disco, wanderings through the woods. But expectations and needs of the girl and her mother are diverging repeatedly, especially when a man attracts Evas attention and disturbs the growing closeness between mother and daughter.

programme.title: Aizbēgt trīs dienās
programme.desc: Džona dzīve šķiet ideāla līdz brīdim, kad viņa sieva Lara tiek apcietināta par slepkavību, kuru viņa nav pastrādājusi. Visi izmisīgie centieni sievu atbrīvot ar tiesas palīdzību ir nesekmīgi. Džons nolemj izstrādāt bīstamu un pārdrošu plānu, lai kopā ar savu sievu aizbēgtu no cietuma...

programme.title: Blakusparādības
programme.desc: Pastāv uzskats, ka cilvēki spēj izmantot tikai 20 procentus savu smadzeņu. Vai varat iedomāties, kas notiktu, ja jūs spētu tās izmantot pilnībā? Pietiek ar vienu tableti, lai sasniegtu pilnību. Ko jūs darītu? Tiektos pēc slavas, varas? Cik tālu jūs būtu gatavi iet?

programme.title: Idiokrātija
programme.desc: Iepazīstieties ar Džo Baueru. Viņu gan nevar uzskatīt par izcilību, taču, kad valdības īpašais eksperiments ar iesaldēšanu izgāžas, viņš nonāk tālajā 2505. gadā. Sabiedrība ir degradējusies. To vada pilnīgs komerciālisms un trula televīzijas programma, un Džo kļūst par gudrāko cilvēku uz planētas. Tagad viduvējā Džo ziņā ir iegriezt cilvēces evolūciju pareizajās sliedēs!

programme.title: Melnais gulbis
programme.desc: Ņujorkas baleta trupas balerīnas Ninas dzīve ir deja. Viņa dzīvo kopā ar māti Ēriku, kas ir izbijusi balerīna un aizgūtnēm atbalsta meitas profesionālās ambīcijas. Kad mākslinieciskais režisors izlemj nomainīt prīmu izrādē "Gulbju ezers", viņa izvēle ir tieši Nina. Tomēr viņai uzrodas konkurente - jaunā dejotāja Lilī, kuras sniegums arī aizrauj režisoru. Izrādei ir vajadzīga dejotāja, kas spēj nodejot gan Balto gulbi ar nevainību un grāciju, kā arī Melno gulbi, kas iemieso viltu un jutekliskumu. Nina pilnībā atbilst Baltā tēlam, bet Lilī ir Melnā gulbja iemiesojums. Kad jaunās dejotājas uzsāk sāncensību par šo lomu, viņu draudzība kļūst arvien sarežģītāka un Nina arvien vairāk saskaras ar draudzenes rakstura tumšo pusi un abas ir gatavas viena otru iznīcināt.

programme.title: Mis Saulstariņš
programme.desc: Uz ekrāniem filma par vienu visdīvainākajām ģimenēm kino vēsturē - Hūveriem. Lai piepildītu jaunākās meitas Olivas sapni piedalīties skaistuma un talantu konkursā, viņi dodas ceļā uz Kaliforniju.

programme.title: Bens ir atgriezies
programme.desc: Deviņpadsmitgadīgais Bens Bērnss aizbēg no rehabilitācijas centra un negaidīti atgriežas mājās tieši uz Ziemassvētkiem. Bena māte Holija priecājas satikt dēlu, taču raizējas, vai viņš neatsāks lietot narkotikas. Turpmāko 24 stundu laikā gaismā nāk dažādi noslēpumi, un māte dara visu, lai pasargātu dēlu no lielām briesmām.

programme.title: Last Bite Hotel
programme.desc: Tituss Burgess asks the remaining chefs to create a noodle dish for Iron Chef Michael Symon. The bottom two chefs face off in a sudden-death round.

programme.title: Chef Grudge Match
programme.desc: Brian Goodman is laying claim to Jonathan Sawyers James Beard Award, and DeUnaka Haley is battling to earn Niema DiGrazias trust.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Bobbys Triple Threat
programme.desc: Chef Shota Nakajima, a master of Japanese cuisine, brings his Michelin training and pristine technique to combat his mentors, Bobby Flays Titans.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: Seven courageous bakers are tasked with creating terrifying desserts in this spooky baking competition. Hosted by ventriloquist Jeff Dunham and his sidekick Walter, the competition invites talented bakers to showcase their talents in Halloween-themed challenges. They will have to conjure all of their baking abilities if they are to become the champion, and the winner of the series takes home a frightening $25,000. With a number of prominent judges overseeing their work, there is no room for error, and contestants are eliminated each week until only one remains.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Cupcake Championship
programme.desc: Four cupcake connoisseurs battle it out in this cooking competition series, hoping to prove they are the supreme cupcake bakers and take home the $10,000 prize. Each of these contestants are undoubtedly talented cupcake designers, but there can only be one winner, and the heat is on to showcase their artistry and flair when it comes to baking these little sweet treats. Hosted by Kardea Brown, the show give the bakers new challenges to complete in each episode, with the poorest performing contestant eliminated at each stage of the competition, resulting in a final showdown between the very best.

programme.title: Cake Boss
programme.desc: Carlos Bakery in Hoboken New Jersey create elaborate, elegant and interesting edible art cakes. Cake Boss follows the team, led by Buddy Valastro, as they design and create two of these masterpieces for all kinds of events and occassions. The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.
