programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Outrageous Pumpkins
programme.desc: Pumpkin carving is one of the most fun activities during autumn season. But these individuals take it to the next level, creating real works of art out of their pumpkins. Watch them compete in a series of fun challenges for a great cash prize. They transform the pumpkins into various spooky things, from monsters to zombies and more.

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: Seven courageous bakers are tasked with creating terrifying desserts in this spooky baking competition. Hosted by ventriloquist Jeff Dunham and his sidekick Walter, the competition invites talented bakers to showcase their talents in Halloween-themed challenges. They will have to conjure all of their baking abilities if they are to become the champion, and the winner of the series takes home a frightening $25,000. With a number of prominent judges overseeing their work, there is no room for error, and contestants are eliminated each week until only one remains.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: Новости: a news report from Ukraine with details of the latest national and international stories.

programme.title: Pasaules ieņemšana. Cīņa par Losandželosu
programme.desc: Zemi pārsteidz nezināma ienaidnieka uzbrukums – krīt nepārtraukts milzīgu meteorītu lietus, savā ceļā izpostot visu. Ātri vien kļūst skaidrs, ka pasauli cenšas iekarot citplanētieši. Tiem pretī nekavējoties stājas armija, taču spēki nešķiet samērīgi. Jūras kājinieku seržants Nants jau gatavojās atvaļināties, taču nu tiek nozīmēts uz jaunzveidoto kaujas vienību. Šīs vienības uzdevums ir glābt civiliedzīvotājus, kas ieslodzīti policijas iecirknī citplanētiešu iekarotajā teritorijā. Ir tikai trīs stundas laika, lai paveiktu misiju, jo tad Gaisa spēkiem tiks dota komanda bombardēt šo teritoriju.

programme.title: After. Pēc kritiena
programme.desc: Tesa ir gatava jaunam dzīves posmam. Spožais prestižas koledžas diploms paver jaunas iespējas – meitene atrod sapņu darbu starptautiskā kompānijā. Viņas nodoms pārcelties uz Sietlu nemaz neiepriecina Hārdinu. Viņa neapmierinātība, pārmetumi un mūžīgā greizsirdība sāpīgi ievaino Tesu un rada bažas. Vai ir vērts visu likt uz kārts un upurēt daudzsološu karjeru? Taču kā lai aizmirst kopā pavadītās naktis un kaislīgos skūpstus, viņa ciešos vīrieša apskāvienus un tuvību, kas padara traku?

programme.title: "Back to Black"
programme.desc: Filma "Back to Black" ir stāsts par 21.gs. zvaigzni Eimiju Vainhausu no pusaudzes gadiem līdz pasaulslavenā albuma "Back to Black" tapšanai, atklājot neatkārtojamo radošo dzirksti, asprātību un atklātību, kā arī cenšoties izprast viņas dēmonus. Albums "Back To Black" ieguva 5 Grammy balvas, un ir viens no visvairāk pārdotajiem albumiem. Tajā ir Eimijas sirdspuksti, skaļāki ar katru sirdssāpi, katra dziesma ir viņas un Bleika mīlas stāsts.

programme.title: Māceklis
programme.desc: Stāsts par meistaru un viņa mācekli Ņujorkas nekustamo īpašumu džungļos. 70. gadu sākumā Donalds Tramps ir iesācējs – kompleksu mākts lietu kārtotājs, kurš atrodas tētuka Trampa seniora pavēnī. Iepazīstoties ar advokātu Roju Konu, viņa dzīve mainās. Zogot no citiem idejas, spārnotus teicienus (arī no Reigana) un pārņemot Kona taktiku, Tramps kļūst par savu "labāko versiju". AIDS epidēmija, šovbiznesa ziedonis un itāļu marmora modernās pilis. Pilsēta, kas nekad neguļ, ir Trampa spēļu laukums – tiesa, tajā viņam pašam kļūst par šauru.

programme.title: Mīluļu slepenā dzīve
programme.desc: Makss (Luiss Sīkejs) ir enerģisks un sajūsmināts Džeka Rasela terjers, kurš dzīvo Manhetenas dzīvoklī kopā ar īpašnieci Keitiju (Elija Kempere). Taču viņa laimīgā dzīve pārtrūkst, kad saimniece pieņem jaunu suni Grāfu (Ēriks Stounstrīts). Makss apņemas atgūt saimnieces uzmanību tikai sev un mēģina Grāfu atstāt kādā sānielā, taču viņus ielenc kaķu banda, kuru vada Ozons (Stīvs Kūgans). Viņi tik tikko izglābj savas dzīvības, kad nākas saskarties ar pamesto dzīvnieku armijas niknumu apburošā, bet psihiski nelīdzsvarotā truša Sniegapikas (Kevins Hārts) vadībā. Šis ir Ņujorkas piedzīvojums, kurš liek Maksam un Grāfam izvērtēt savu sacensību un mēģināt izjaukt Sniegapikas atriebes plānu pret visiem dzīvnieku īpašniekiem Ņujorkā.

programme.title: Džumandži: Laipni lūgti džungļos
programme.desc: Četri vidusskolēni atrod vecu spēļu konsoli ar līdz šim neredzētu videospēli džumandži. Viņi iesaistās šajā spēlē, kas norisinās džungļos, un iemiesojas pašu izraudzītajos avataros. Jaunieši apjauš, ka džumandži ir kas vairāk par spēli, tā ir cīņa par izdzīvošanu. Lai uzvarētu spēlē, viņiem jādodas bīstamākajā piedzīvojumā mūžā, jāatklāj Alana Periša pirms 20 gadiem atstātās pēdas un jāmaina priekšstats pašiem par sevi, pretējā gadījumā viņi paliks ieslēgti spēlē uz visiem laikiem...

programme.title: Van Gogs. Pie mūžības vārtiem
programme.desc: Gleznotāja Van Goga dzīvesstāsts par laiku, ko viņš pavadīja Francijā, Arlā.

programme.title: Palaidnīgā feja
programme.desc: 337 gadus jaunajai zobu fejai Violetai maģija nešķiet īpaši aizraujoša, tāpēc viņa vienīgā nespēj nokārtot eksāmenu, lai iegūtu kristālu, kas fejām ļauj iekļūt cilvēku pasaulē. Violeta neļauj skumjām vaļu, nozog kristālu citai fejai un nokļūst 12 gadus vecās bārenītes Maksijas istabā. Tomēr, ak vai! Kristāls saplīst, un nu Violeta ir iesprostota cilvēku pasaulē! Kopā ar Maksiju viņa meklē atpakaļceļu un atklāj savu patieso aicinājumu.

programme.title: Naudas cena: Largo Vinča piedzīvojums
programme.desc: Largo Vinčs izmisīgi meklē savu nolaupīto dēlu, saprotot, ka pēdas pie tiem, kas izraisījuši viņa bankrotu, varētu aizvest arī pie Largo dēla.

programme.title: Lepnā princese
programme.desc: Jaunajam un izskatīgajam karalim Bendžaminam ir pienācis laiks precēties. Viņu savaldzina princeses Karolīnas portrets. Kad princese viņu atraida, karalis, pārģērbies par dārznieku, iekļūst Karolīnas pilī un iekaro viņas sirdi.

programme.title: Atmiņas par nākotni
programme.desc: 1914. gadā, laužot pieņēmumus par sievieti tā laika sabiedrībā, Vera Britena kļūst par Somervilas koledžas studenti Oksfordā. Sākoties Pirmajam pasaules karam, viņas brālis Edvards, līgavainis Rolands Leitons un draugi Viktors un Džefrijs tiek nosūtīti cīnīties frontes priekšējās līnijās. Arī Vera ziedojas un atstāj koledžu, lai dotos līdzi un pievienotos brīvprātīgo mediķu organizācijai, rūpējoties par ievainotajiem un mirstošajiem kareivjiem Londonā, Maltā un Francijā.

programme.title: After. Pēc mūsu tikšanās
programme.desc: Pēc Annas Todas grāmatas veidotā filma atklāj jaunas sievietes aizraušanos ar sava kaisles objekta tumšo pusi, cerot uz īstu mīlestību.

programme.title: Gultā ar slepkavu
programme.desc: Nelabais ir detaļās… Nekas nav tā, kā izskatās, kad vienas nakts sakars pārtop sērijveida slepkavas nežēlīgā slepkavību virknē.

programme.title: Īlaijas grāmata
programme.desc: Pa postapokaliptisko zemi, kas reiz bija Amerika, ceļo kāds vīrs. Caur tukšām pilsētām, izpostītām autostrādēm - pa zemi, kas pārvērtusies pelnos. Šeit nav civilizācijas un nekādu likumu. Ceļi pieder bandām, kas nogalinās cilvēku par pāri kurpju vai malku ūdens. Taču sacensties ar vientuļnieku nav pa spēkam nevienam - Īlaija pieveiks ikvienu, kas to izaicinās. Tomēr viņš necīnās par savu labklājību, viņam ir misija, ko viņš apņēmies veikt līdz galam.

programme.title: Zombijzemē: Otrais šāviens
programme.desc: Nesaudzīgā un bezbailīgā zombiju mednieku četrotne dodas uz Amerikas vidieni, par savu jauno mājvietu atrodot Balto namu. Tur viņi stāsies pretī ne tikai jauna veida dzīvajiem miroņiem, bet arī citiem izdzīvojušajiem, kas nebūt nav draudzīgi noskaņoti. Turklāt viņu pašu vidū rodas nopietnas domstarpības.

programme.title: Naktsmītne
programme.desc: Topošā sieva ar diviem sava līgavaiņa bērniem apmetusies brīvdienu namā kādā attālā ciematā. Attiecībām atsalstot, sāk risināties dīvaini un biedējoši notikumi.

programme.title: 65: Iznīcības robeža
programme.desc: Pēc katastrofālas avārijas uz nezināmas planētas pilots Milss ātri vien aptver, ka viņam un otrai dzīvi palikušajai pasažierei Koai ir tikai vienīga iespēja izglābties – viņiem jātiek pāri nezināmajam apvidum, kuru pārņēmuši bīstami radījumi, un jāliek lietā visi spēki, lai izdzīvotu.

programme.title: Trakās ķepas. Leģenda par Henku
programme.desc: Henks varbūt ir necils suns, taču viņš ir apņēmības pilns kļūt par samuraju. Suņuks dodas uz valsti, kur čum un mudž no kaķiem. Tur Henks satiek nejauko kaķu karavadoni Iku Ču un arī Džimbo, kurš reiz bijis varens samurajs. Džimbo paņem Henku savā paspārnē un iemāca viņam, ko īsti nozīmē būt samurajam. Dzimstot pirmajai īstajai draudzībai starp kaķi un suni, abiem nākas glābt Kakamučo no ļaunā Ika Ču.

programme.title: Zaķu skola: Misija Olas
programme.desc: Īsi pirms Lieldienām svinīgā rituālā maģiskā Zelta ola palīdz noskaidrot zaķu čempionus. Un pirmo reizi zaķu skolas vēsturē izvēlēts arī pilsētas zaķis - un tas ir Makss! Vaļoties Maksam vairs itin nemaz nav laika, jo viņam kopā ar Lieldienu zaķa draugiem jāpilnveido savas prasmes. Tomēr pirms paša pirmā treniņa zaķu maģiskā spēka avots Zelta ola kļūst melna. Pie vainas ir bandas vadonis Leo, kurš nevēlas, lai Lieldienas notiku. Ko nu?!

programme.title: Varenais Ričards
programme.desc: Zvirbulis Ričijs kopš dzimšanas pieņemts stārķu ģimenē, visi viņu ļoti mīl, viņš ātri aug un jūtas kā īsts stārķis. Taču gājputniem stārķiem pienāk laiks lidot uz Āfriku, lai tur ziemotu. Ģimene ir spiesta atklāt Ričijam viņa izcelšanos, jo lidot kopā nedrīkst – grūtajā ceļojumā zvirbulis var iet bojā. Drosminieks negrasās nolaist spārnus un nolemj visiem pierādīt, ka ir īsts stārķis. Ričijs viens pats dodas ceļā, un viņam pievienojas jauni draugi – pūce Olga un papagailis Kiki.

programme.title: Robotu sapņi
programme.desc: Suņa un robota piedzīvojumi un neveiksmes Ņujorkā 80.-ajos gados.

programme.title: Bada garša
programme.desc: Kāds pāris ziedo visu, tikai lai saņemtu visaugstāko atzinību pavārmākslas pasaulē — Michelin zvaigzni.

programme.title: Vilks un Lauva
programme.desc: Pēc vectēva nāves 20 gadus vecā pianiste Alma atgriežas bērnības mājās. Drīz viņas dzīvē notiek negaidīts pavērsiens. Nez no kurienes uzradusies vectēva draudzene baltā vilcene atved savu mazuli un pati nozūd. Tad netālu avarē lidmašīna, un meitene tās atlūzās atrod brīnumainā kārtā izdzīvojušu lauvēnu. Alma nolemj abus paturēt, un notiek neticamais – mazuļi kopā aug un iemīl viens otru kā brāļus. Bet idilliskā pasaule sabrūk, kad viņu noslēpums nāk gaismā.

programme.title: Alvins un burunduki
programme.desc: Komponists Deivs jau krietnu laiku cenšas gūt panākumus mūzikas nozarē. Lai gan viņa bijušais studiju biedrs ir ticis augstā amatā kādā ierakstu kompānijā, Deivam nekādi neizdodas sasniegt mērķi. Stāvoklis kļūst cerīgāks, kad Deivs iepazīstas ar trim dziedošiem burundukiem, kas slēpjas Ziemsvētku eglītē ierakstu kompānijas galvenajā ēkā.

programme.title: Eliots: pats mazākais ziemeļbriedis
programme.desc: Eliots ir mazs zirdziņš, kuram ir ļoti liels sapnis, - ieņemt godpilno vietu Ziemassvētku vecīša ziemeļbriežu pajūgā, lai dāvātu bērniem prieku svētkos. Pēc tam kad Ziemassvētku vecītis nāk klajā ar paziņojumu, ka tūlīt dosies pensijā, mazajam Eliotam atliek vien tikai trīs dienas, lai pieradītu pārējiem, ka viņš ir šī goda cienīgs, neskatoties uz to, ka viņam nav atbilstošu ragu. Ja kaut ko ļoti vēlies no visas sirds, tad brīnumi notiek, vai ne?

programme.title: Darba rūķis
programme.desc: Levons Keids pameta godalgotu militāro karjeru slepenajās operācijās, lai dzīvotu vienkāršu dzīvi, strādājot celtniecībā. Bet, kad viņa priekšnieka meitu, kas viņam ir kā radiniece, nolaupa cilvēku tirgotāji, viņš atklāj korupcijas pasauli, kas ir daudz lielāka, nekā viņš varēja iedomāties.

programme.title: Izlaušanās spēle
programme.desc: Seši savstarpēji nepazīstami cilvēki saņem ielūgumu piedalīties izlaušanās spēlē, kurā viņiem jāatrod izeja no dažādām telpām. Atrisinot virkni mīklu, veiksmīgais uzvarētājs balvā saņems 10 000 dolāru. Tomēr šķietami nevainīgā jautrība drīz izvēršas cīņā uz dzīvību un nāvi. Sapratuši, ka tam, kurš istabu pamet pēdējais, ir lemts mirt, viņi ir spiesti likt lietā visu savu atjautību, lai izdzīvotu.

programme.title: Advokāts
programme.desc: Bagāts un veiksmīgs advokāts taisās precēties ar savu līgavu, taču drīz vien iesaistās sarežģītā narkotiku darījumā ar starpnieku, kuru dēvē par Vestreju. Plāns piedzīvo šausmīgu pavērsienu, un puisim jāsargā sevi un topošo līgavu, jo atklājas patiesība par narkotiku biznesu, un liecinieki tiek likvidēti.

programme.title: Krauklis
programme.desc: Dvēseles radinieki Ēriks Dravens un Šellija Vēbstere tiek nežēlīgi nogalināti. Saņemot iespēju upurēt sevi un glābt savu mūža mīlestību, Ēriks dodas ceļā, šķērsojot dzīvo un mirušo pasauli, lai atriebtos un izcīnītu taisnību.

programme.title: Cīņus sports: One Championship. ONE Friday Fights
programme.desc: Coverage from the ONE Championship; martial arts competitions which include mixed martial arts (MMA), Muay Thai, and kickboxing. Enjoy all the action with top-class competitors from across Asia and the world.

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. Crvena Zvezda - Real Madrid
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: LaLiga. Barcelona - Girona
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Bundesliga. Bayern - Dortmund
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

programme.title: Serie A. Roma - Inter
programme.desc: Coverage of Italys top-flight football league.

programme.title: Futbols: LaLiga. Villarreal - Real Betis

programme.title: UFC. Fight Night: Reinier de Ridder vs Brendan Allen
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. Anadolu Efes - Panathinaikos
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: Hokejs: Šveices Nacionālā līga. Davos - ZSC Lions
programme.desc: The National League is a professional ice hockey league in Switzerland and is the top tier of the Swiss league system.

programme.title: NHL. New York Islanders - Ottawa Senators
programme.desc: All the action and stories of the elimination tournament in the National Hockey League consisting of four rounds of best-of-seven series. Who will be the league champion and the winner of the Stanley Cup?

programme.title: LaLiga. Villarreal - Real Betis
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Futbols: Bundesliga. Bayern - Dortmund
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

programme.title: UFC. Reinier de Ridder-Brendan Allen
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. programme.title: Rehab Addict
programme.desc: Rehab Addict is a TV show documenting home renovations, hosted by a charming designer Nicole Curtis. Nicole is a strong supporter of the idea of preservation and restoration of existing architecture when possible instead of its destruction. Her philosophy is to "restore old homes to their former glory" rather than modernization. She has revived historic homes in Michigan, Ohio and Minnesota and saved them from the wrecking ball. Nicole deals with the government bureaucrats, creates a team and together they go above and beyond to bring back former glory to the old buildings. Nicole is a bundle of energy and a perfect source of motivation and inspiration.

programme.title: Unsellable Houses
programme.desc: Real estate consultants and twin sisters Leslie Davis and Lyndsay Lamb have a knack for helping desperate homeowners sell their lifeless homes. After visiting nearby comparables, the sisters make the necessary, impactful renovations that convert these unlovable houses into diamonds in the rough.

programme.title: Bargain Block
programme.desc: Bargain Block follows home renovation experts and partners Keith Bynum and Evan Thomas on their journey to restore Detroits iconic American neighborhoods one house at a time. With sound advice and support from their friend—lifetime Detroit resident and real estate expert Shea Hicks-Whitfield, who is expecting her first child—Keith and Evan buy multiple rundown and abandoned houses on a single block, take them down to the studs, and create affordable, stylish and fully furnished starter homes that are ideal for first-time homebuyers. Now settled in the Motor City, the couple, who have renovated and purchased their own home and opened a new retail store and workshop, infuse every property with a functional layout, artful design and beautiful repurposed furniture. The end result is incredible transformations of dilapidated homes that are an inspiration to the entire neighborhood.

programme.title: Bargain Mansions
programme.desc: Based in Kansas City, Tamara Day is a restoration expert who believes no home is too big for her to take on. Scouring the city for large, neglected mansions that she can buy on the cheap, she then uses her eye for design to transform these shabby houses into elegant homes. With her dad helping her on each project, they gut the decaying aspects of each house whilst keeping any characteristic and authentic features, enticing deep-pocketed buyers with open concepts and modern layouts. Using her experience from maintaining buildings on the family farm, she turns these decrepit structures into warm homes that are perfect for a family to move in and start creating memories.

programme.title: Bargain Block
programme.desc: Bargain Block follows home renovation experts and partners Keith Bynum and Evan Thomas on their journey to restore Detroits iconic American neighborhoods one house at a time. With sound advice and support from their friend—lifetime Detroit resident and real estate expert Shea Hicks-Whitfield, who is expecting her first child—Keith and Evan buy multiple rundown and abandoned houses on a single block, take them down to the studs, and create affordable, stylish and fully furnished starter homes that are ideal for first-time homebuyers. Now settled in the Motor City, the couple, who have renovated and purchased their own home and opened a new retail store and workshop, infuse every property with a functional layout, artful design and beautiful repurposed furniture. The end result is incredible transformations of dilapidated homes that are an inspiration to the entire neighborhood.

programme.title: Fix My Flip
programme.desc: Real estate broker Page Turner brings her team, money, and tough love to help overwhelmed flippers get their wayward projects back on track.

programme.title: First Home Fix
programme.desc: Raisa and Austin pull off two renovations. Mark and Michael want a space to relax while Bethany and Daves growing family needs storage and functionality.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: A young, Southern couple decides to buy their first home in Gulf Shores, AL. They hope to find a home with a fenced-in garden for their dogs.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: An engaged couple searches for a home in beautiful Gulf Shores, Alabama, so they can be closer to the water and spend more time on their boat.

programme.title: House Hunters: Amazing Water Homes
programme.desc: A Texas couple are looking for a home in the Bahamas. They love the properties in Nassau but may need to reduce their wish list to must-haves.

programme.title: House Hunters: Amazing Water Homes
programme.desc: After years of living in Las Vegas, a couple longs to return home to Slidell, Louisiana. Theyre looking for a place on the water.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: A couple wants to buy their first home on Aquidneck Island. With a toddler and another baby on the way, they hope to find a property with a garden for the boys.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: A couple follows a job opportunity to Long Beach, New York. They want their twins to grow up by the ocean, so they look for a home near the water.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: Captivating docu-reality series in which Rebecca Budig shows viewers some of the worlds most amazing, luxurious and extraordinary water featured homes. You will have a chance to see what happens when you combine creativity, ingenuity and lots and lots of water when she takes us on a tour of cool properties such as a private water parks, islands and lakes, luxury houseboats and yachts with every amenity imaginable including a private crew.

programme.title: House Hunters: Amazing Water Homes
programme.desc: A family is ready to give up surfside California for the Colorado River in Arizona. They love boats, jet skis and want plenty of space for their toys.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Join host Tony Harris as he investigates the most mysterious content ever captured and attempts to unearth the truth. Employing the assistance of experts and state-of-the-art technology, Tony is determined to decipher whether these photos, videos and audio recordings of purported supernatural and paranormal events are falsified or for real. He meets with eyewitnesses, conducts tests and stops at nothing to determine the truth.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: American Pickers is an American reality series that follows ingenious "pickers" Mike Wolfe, and his business partner, Frank Fritz, as they hunt down objects with historical, collectible and pop culture value. They travel around the United States to buy or "pick" various items for resale, for clients, or for their own personal collections. Danielle Colby is in charge of their office of Antique Archaeology.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Storage Wars show a team of professional buyers will prove that for a good buy you need more than certain sum of money. When rent is not paid on a storage locker for a certain period, the contents can be sold as a single lot of items in the form of an auction. The best experts are fighting for containers contents, hundreds of thousands of dollars are sometimes in the game. Every participant has only some minutes to inspect the contents, and that only without entering the storage room, just looking inside. Each purchase can become a win or a loss, and nobody knows exactly whether they are buying real treasures or garbage.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Join host Tony Harris as he investigates the most mysterious content ever captured and attempts to unearth the truth. programme.title: Great Escapes with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: The Academy Award-winning actor explores the stories of some of the most famous jailbreaks in history, from notorious places like Alcatraz, Dannemora and Pittsburgh State Penitentiary. Freeman, who once played the character of prisoner Red in the legendary Shawshank Redemption, investigates these incredible real-life escapes using cutting-edge technology to recreate them. Join him to discover the untold stories behind these daring jailbreaks, through firsthand accounts from prisoners, their cellmates, families and prison employees.

programme.title: Engineering an Empire
programme.desc: Documentary series, hosted by Peter Weller, an actor and a professor at Syracuse University, that explores the engineering and architectural achievements that were characteristic of some of the greatest civilizations on this planet - Rome, Egypt, Greece, the Aztecs, the Maya, Russia, China, the Persians, the Byzantines, Britain, France, and Italy in the late 15th and 16th centuries. Using interviews with experts, re-enactments, and computer-generated graphics, this programme looks at various structures, buildings and mechanical inventions, from Menes dam built in around 3000 BC in Egypt to the worlds first locomotive invented in Britain.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: The most venomous creature of the sea is on the move and spreading across the oceans leaving a trail of poisoned victims. These monsters, known to kill within three minutes, have been part of the ecosystem for more than 500 million years.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Documentary series that brings back to life lost cities, structures, cultures, and civilisations, transporting viewers back in time and revealing the truth behind some of historys most iconic eras. Using a combination of cutting-edge technology and archaeological research, the team detail what life was like for these places during their peak of their powers, and use visual overlays to compare past and present landscapes. From the Knights Templar to the lost city of Atlantis, ancient Egypt to Hitlers planned supercity, and ancient Athens to Americas wild west, each episodes dives into these extraordinary remnants of human history.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. It has been fifty years since the man traveled to outer space, but there are too many secrets unrevealed. The series reconstructs life on other planets and galaxies, fantasizes about life and all its possible forms in other atmospheres. You can witness space accidents, parallel universe, the velocity of light and discover new facts about mysterious outer space.

programme.title: Breaking Mysterious
programme.desc: Join host Jimmy Church and his team of truth-seeking investigators as they examine some of the biggest mysteries, extraordinary phenomena and unconventional conspiracy theories in America. Episodes include investigating a plot to assassinate President John F. Kennedy just weeks before his actual, tragic assassination in Dallas with vital new information being obtained from one of the Presidents secret servicemen; debating the possibility that a popular virtual smartphone game could actually be part of a CIA mind control operation; or tracking the events when a nuclear weapon goes missing off the coast of Georgias Tybee Island. Follow the team as they seek disclosure, answers and the truth in this adventurous series.

programme.title: Chasing Mummies
programme.desc: Reality series following the adventures of Egyptologist Dr Zahi Hawass and his team as they search for the secrets of ancient Egypt. Travelling across this fascinating country, Dr Zahi Hawass and his crew embark on a historical and archaeological expedition – and try to preserve important artefacts.

programme.title: How the Earth Was Made
programme.desc: With the help of expert geologists and various scientists, How the Earth Was Made is a remarkable documentary series that examines the powerful forces and events that have shaped our planet. Using stunning, computer generated cinematography, viewers are transported back billions of years to learn how our planet was formed, and the drastically different changes it has witnessed. Each episode focusses on a different location to explore how it has adapted and adjusted over millions of years, such as the Grand Canyon, Mount Everest, the Sahara desert and the Mariana Trench.

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Lost History
programme.desc: Host Brad Meltzer and viewers are on the hunt for lost and stolen history, including Hitlers personal photo albums and James Bonds original Aston Martin. Plus, an FBI sting operation seeks a Civil War relic stained with human blood.

programme.title: In Search Of Aliens
programme.desc: In Search Of Aliens is an American TV series following Giorgio Tsoukalos, a writer, ufologist, television presenter and producer. He is a proponent of the pseudoarchaeological theory that ancient alien astronauts interacted with ancient humans. He takes the viewers on a paranormal journey, suggesting that aliens made contact with primitive humans long time ago and there is such evidence as Indian Sanskrit texts, describing flying machines called Vimanas; Jewish Zohar writings describing a "manna machine" similar to chlorella algae processing of today and many more. He explores the fascinating evidence behind the Earths most famous mysteries.

programme.title: The Curse of Civil War Gold
programme.desc: The Curse of Civil War Gold is a non-fiction series about American Civil War history. Michigan native, part time treasure hunter Kevin Dykstra and his team search for lost treasures of Civil War Gold, estimated to be worth millions of dollars. They join forces with Marty Lagina from The Curse of Oak Island trying to solve the mystery and find the lost gold. The story goes that Union soldiers tracked down Confederate president Jefferson Davis in 1865 and confiscated his gold. Later it was smuggled north and ended up in Lake Michigan. And this is exactly where Kevin and his crew head to.

programme.title: In Search Of Aliens
programme.desc: In Search Of Aliens is an American TV series following Giorgio Tsoukalos, a writer, ufologist, television presenter and producer. programme.title: Hunting Hitler
programme.desc: Following the release of declassified FBI documents pertaining to the death of Adolf Hitler, a team of world-renowned investigators ask the question of whether he really killed himself in a bunker in Berlin. The report states that "American Army officials in Germany have not located Hitlers body nor is there any reliable source that will say definitely that Hitler is dead." Using modern technology and updated investigation techniques, they will try to define what actually happened to the man who plunged the world into war in 1939. Their investigation will lead them towards a mysterious bunker in Argentina, a missing U-Boat and a potential safe house. Historical documentary series narrated by Dave Hoffman.

programme.title: Ross Kemp: Deep Sea Treasure Hunter
programme.desc: Have a look at the history series and its four episodes telling us how Ross Kemp, presenter and journalist, is making his life-long dream come true. He dives down on shipwrecks to uncover hidden stories and recover true treasures and mysterious stories hidden behind. Neil Brock is his personal guide and dive supervisor providing him a special intensive training course. Expert divers Emily Turton and Mallory Haas accompany Ross along his exploration around various parts of the UK.

programme.title: The Hunt for Baltic Gold
programme.desc: Amber has been coveted in Poland since the 15th century, when handmade jewellery incorporating this semi-precious stone (even though it is not a stone) was sought after by members of the Royal, Imperial, Papal and Ottoman Courts. With 70% of the worlds amber being produced in Poland, the industry is still thriving, especially in the coastal areas around the port city of Gdansk. The viewer will learn about the journey of amber, from its origins as fossilized tree resin to its extraction from the ground and its transfromation into creative and beautiful decorations. The show also tells the story of the people who work in the industry and the difficulties they face in harvesting the amber, getting it to market and selling it.

programme.title: Lost Gold of WW2
programme.desc: Its said to be the greatest lost treasure from World War II and, in this documentary series, a team of engineers, scientists and investigators attempt to finally locate the loot of General Tomoyuki Yamashita. As the war was drawing to a close, General Yamashita is rumoured to have buried a stolen loot made up of worth hundreds of billions of dollars in Southeast Asia. With the world in a state of disarray and confusion, the loot has been left to sink into the shadows, until now. The team hope to unearth its location using groundbreaking technology, studying three different locations in the Philippines that could hold valuable answers.

programme.title: Ancient Top
programme.desc: Ancient Top 10 presents the most fascinating inventions, creations, events and historical figures of the ancient world. Take a journey back in time and discover some of the most amazing facts about ancient civilizations in this entertaining countdown television series, to find out things you never knew about Greeks, Egyptians, Romans and more. Combining CGI and archival footage, the show ranks different things in every episode, from greatest monuments and ships and cities and dictators and much more.

programme.title: UFO Files
programme.desc: In the search for life beyond our planet, this documentary investigates areas on earth that are said to have had UFO activity, conspiracy theories and phenomenons. Interviewing a variety of scientists and experts on UFOs and examining when possible evidence can prove or suggest anything towards super natural life. From going off of tales that have been told and spread through generations and or cultures to personal experiences where sighting have occurred the series covers the super natural phenomenon that is life beyond earth.

programme.title: Missing in Alaska
programme.desc: Tlingit folklore describes a creature thats half-otter, half-man, and steals the souls of its victims. Could a shapeshifting otter-man, or Kushtaka, be disguising itself to target humans as prey? Our team investigate whether this creature is a myth.

programme.title: Warriors
programme.desc: At the Battle of Isandlwana in 1879, Zulu warriors overwhelmed an occupying British army in what became Englands worst defeat at the hands of a colonial force. Join modern-day warrior, Terry Schappert, to discover their weaponry, tactics and psyche.

programme.title: Food Tech
programme.desc: Host Bobby Bognar explores Americas buffets, starting in Las Vegas. He learns shrimp-catching secrets in Florida, horseradish spice in Wisconsin, honey-making in California and sugar cane processing in Hawaii.

With dramatic recreations and exclusive interviews, each episode delves deep into the murky waters that cloud their investigations in the hopes of discovering what really happened and finally delivering justice to the victims and their families.

programme.title: Deadly Affairs
programme.desc: When Bills dismembered torso is found floating in the Chesapeake Bay suspicion falls on his wife - did she kill him? Plus, a high octane affair takes a fatal turn.

programme.title: Deadly Affairs
programme.desc: A Michigan couple starts up a comic book store and hire an outsider who changes their marriage forever. And in Texas, a new co-worker threatens the sanctity of a Christian marriage.

programme.title: Crime Scene Confidential

programme.title: Who the Hell...

programme.title: American Monster

American Monster reveals the truth behind some of the most shocking crimes thats happened around the country. programme.title: Disappeared
programme.desc: Disappeared is an American documentary TV show that contains dramatic re-enactments and interviews with law enforcement officers, investigators, and relatives connected with cases in which individuals have gone missing without a trace. The stories are heartbreaking and unbelievable, the families of people who have gone missing never give up hope. Some cases have tragic endings, some are heartwarming, but most of them are still open which makes the agony of the families go on.

programme.title: Still A Mystery
programme.desc: The body of a musician is found in an alleyway and a construction worker disappears on the job. Police desperately search for clues about these callous murders.

programme.title: Still A Mystery
programme.desc: The family of a student are distressed when they receive a warrant for his arrest. A mother of five vanishes after leaving her house early one morning.

programme.title: The Dead Files
programme.desc: The American paranormal television series focuses on investigations by retired homicide detective Steve DiSchiavi and psychic communicator Amy Allan. The two never communicate during investigation, they study the cases of crimes separately, and only coming to certain conclusions compare their results. Their methods of work are completely opposite: Steve uses common sense, documents, talks to real people, and Amy relies on her sixth sense and her ability to communicate with ghosts and spirits.

programme.title: Ghost Loop
programme.desc: Follow a team of highly specialized paranormal experts, who help both the living and the dead and focus on a distinct type of haunting - ghost loop, which happens when paranormal entities terrorize the living through endless and repetitive supernatural cycles, manifesting again and again in the same location. In each episode, paranormal investigator and medium Sean Austin, empath Kris Star, researcher and tech advisor Chris Califf, design specialist Eric Vitale, and tech support Matt Lytle, examine and research their clients property and history. Then, they formulate a plan they believe will help stop the haunting - whether its building a 1900s-era train compartment, replicating a tavern from the 1850s, or constructing a 19th century babys nursery. The team uses emotionally charged settings to draw out the entities in hopes that it will release the energy and break the loop once and for all.

programme.title: Ghost Bait
programme.desc: Enter the paranormal world of Bob Magill and Tina Storer, two pioneering investigators who delve into mysterious hauntings and happenings across the United States. Both Bob and Tina experienced ordeals with ghosts at a young age, and used these frightening encounters to learn how to overcome their paranormal fears. In this reality series they help frightened citizens do the same. Following Bobs unique methods, they conduct investigations in homes where residents are adamant they are haunted. They use their findings to heighten their clients sense of fear, in turn drawing out the entities that prey on anxiety. Bob And Tina show their clients that the only way to tackle these forces is to embrace their fears.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Ghost Hunters is an American paranormal and documentary reality TV series. The hosts are Jason Hawes and Grant Wilson, plumbers by day, paranormal investigators by night. They are in charge of TAPS- The Atlantic Paranormal Society- a group of ordinary people interested in getting to the bottom of otherworldly disturbances. Together with their team Jason and Grant research supposed paranormal activity, from Mason, Ohios Kings Island amusement park to the Philadelphia Zoo. The purpose of the show is not to prove that a place was haunted, but the opposite. There is a healthy dose of scientific approach in each investigation.

programme.title: Murder In the Heartland
programme.desc: This series focuses on the dark underbelly of the American mid-west, its heartland. Each episode deals with a specific murder thats been commited in one of the small towns that make up this iconic region of the US with the locals enhancing the tales and bringing clues to our attention. The show includes interviews with the victims family, friends, law enforcement officers and also provides dramatic reenactments to bring the stories to life. Episodes reveal true stories such as when an Oklahoma familys dog drops a human skull onto their porch and the police are called in to investigate; a bride-to-be who discovers her betrothed shot in the head in their living room; a beloved father, son and fiancee who is discovered beaten to death in his own driveway; and a devoted family man who diappears after his truck is set on fire.

programme.title: Reasonable Doubt
programme.desc: As we all know, the initial verdict in a trial is not always the final outcome as many trial jury decisions are often overturned on appeal. However, the appeals process can take a significant amount of time to go through the system and also incur enormous costs on the individuals involved. This show follows the work of two investigators who re-examine the verdicts in contentious murder cases and assess the prospects of a successful appeal for the families of the people convicted of the crimes to determine if they should appeal or accept the verdict. Each episode traces the developments in the case, whether it be new evidence or witness testimony, which can then shed light on the innocence of the convicted person or show that, indeed, they are guilty of the crime and the verdict was correct.

programme.title: Who Killed Jane Doe?
programme.desc: A true-crime documentary series examining murders of women and the two aspects of each case; the detectives pursuing the killer and the family struggling to come to terms with their loss. With dramatised reconstructions to portray the events as they happened, each episode focusses on a different, chilling murder, listening to both the professional and personal side of a murder investigation. Whilst detectives scour crime scenes for evidence and clues to identify a victim, a family is waiting in vain for the impending announcement, aware of who the victim could very well be. A unique murder documentary series that offers a reminder of the delicate and poignant side to each investigation.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here: Shadows Of Death
programme.desc: No matter how far you run, or how much time passes, you cant escape your past. And for those who shared a life with an individual who became a killer, the past will always weigh heavy on their mind. This true-crime documentary series interviews loved ones of murderers to understand the impact and emotional turmoil that lingers over their life. In one act of violence, their lives would be changed forever.

programme.title: Real Time Crime
programme.desc: Surveillance video catches three gunmen shooting in an affluent Florida neighbourhood. In Oklahoma, police discover a killer waiting in the shadows on CCTV.

programme.title: Real Time Crime
programme.desc: A killer guns down a rapper outside a New Orleans Waffle House. A string of robberies in Arkansas baffles police until they use video to catch the robbers.

programme.title: Most Evil
programme.desc: Crime documentary series in which forensic psychiatrist Dr. Michael H. Stone examines the roots of human evil by exploring acts committed by infamous criminals and ordinary people which he rates on scale of evil that he developed. His scale ranges from Category 1, which are those who kill in self-defense, to the Category 22, the serial torturer-murderers. Series also includes interviews with various neurologists, psychologists, and other forensic psychiatrists in an attempt to examine and profile the minds of killers. Partial re-enactments are also shown along with news footage, evidence, and reports from people who were somehow linked to the murderers and cases.

programme.title: Til Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: Chilling true-crime documentary series that explores the relationships that ended with fatal result. Series features archive footage, dramatic reconstructions and interviews with family, friends and law enforcement. From a suspicious carbon monoxide incident, a parrot who became an eyewitness to murder, to a spouse with a spiraling gambling addiction, and a motorcycle accident that is not what it seems, each episode will uncover the breaking point in each of these complex and toxic relationships and tell a tragic tale of what happens when love becomes lethal.

programme.title: The 1980s: The Deadliest Decade
programme.desc: Although the 1980s is one of the most fondly remembered decades, it was also a deadly one. This nostalgic crime documentary series looks beyond the big hair, bright and bold make-up, leg-warmers, electronic pop music, yuppie culture and classic movies. This series delves in the sinister side of the decade, revealing some of the more shocking events that took place at this time. Real-life murders are re-enacted. Whilst investigators are still grappling with questions about these horrific crimes after all these years. Shocking tales from all over the USA, from the death of a teenage cheerleader in California to mass murder in Missouri and homicide amongst New Yorks elite - this series may make you think differently about 1980 forever.

programme.title: Who Killed Jessica Carpenter? A Hometown Homicide Mystery
programme.desc: In August 2000, 17-year-old Jessica Carpenter was found dead in her home by her mother. New interviews add shocking details as police search for a possible serial killer.

programme.title: Who Killed the Co-Ed? An ID Murder Mystery
programme.desc: When a college student is found brutally murdered in her off-campus apartment, the evidence makes police think she knew her killer. Six years later, her murderer is still at large.

programme.title: Детали
programme.desc: Узнаем, есть есть ли язык, который нравится людям больше других. Для борьбы с лихорадкой денге в Бразилии выпустят инфицированных комаров. Исследователи из Калифорнии создали новый тип актуатора, сокращающего энергопотребление.

programme.title: Екатерина. Взлёт
programme.desc: Елизавета теряет терпение: прошло 7 лет, а наследника нет. Екатерина не способна родить ребенка? Или что-то не так с Петром Федоровичем? Что ждет Екатерину после признания: крепость, северный монастырь?

programme.title: Екатерина. Взлёт
programme.desc: Елизавета понимает: самой ей уже не родить. Она усиливает давление на Екатерину, которая сохраняет верность мужу. Елизавета призывает к себе князя Салтыкова и без обиняков приказывает действовать. Екатерина оказывается безоружной перед своей первой любовью.

programme.title: Мосты Немцова
programme.desc: Едва избравшись на второй губернаторский срок в Нижегородской области, Немцов получил предложение, от которого не смог отказаться, и в 1997 году перебрался в Москву, став вице-премьером Российского правительства. В столице он присоединился к младореформаторам, работал от рассвета до заката и его рейтинг в первый год работы был невероятно высоким. Вскоре Немцов становится неудобным и против него разворачивают настоящую информационную войну. За полгода рейтинг одобрения падает до одного процента.

programme.title: Мосты Немцова
programme.desc: Борис Немцов ушел с поста вице-премьера и занялся созданием партии, которая летом 1999 года превратилась в Союз Правых Сил. На парламентских выборах новая партия прошла в Государственную Думу под лозунгом "Путина в президенты, Кириенко в Госдуму. Молодых надо!". В Думе СПС продержалась один срок, и на следующих выборах 2003 года не смогла преодолеть 5% избирательный барьер. С тех пор ни одной демократической партии в ГосДуме России не было.

programme.title: Детали
programme.desc: Ученые смоделировали скорость таяния Гренландии - результат не утешительный. Медицинские датчики, из которых в буквальном смысле можно сшить любой предмет гардероба. Солнечная система: узнаем больше о том, когда и как ближайшая звезда влияет на людей.

programme.title: Детали
programme.desc: В воде не тонет, в огне не горит! НАСА тестирует в бассейне свой новый лунный скафандр. Кротовая нора! Нобелевская премия по физике досталась исследователям черных дыр - узнаем, что это значит для современной науки Невидимые нити! Расскажем о новых, способных проводить электричество, волокнах.

programme.title: Детали
programme.desc: Полет шмеля! Расскажем, зачем ученые прикрепляют к насекомым сенсоры и камеры. Жизнь собачья! Посмотрим, как на заводе Ford работает знаменитый робот-пес компании Boston Dynamic. На страже! Спутник Sentinel-6 готовится к грядущему запуску - он будет следить за глобальным потеплением на планете Земля.

programme.title: Преступления из прошлого
programme.desc: В 1941 году чаепитие в Бронксе закончилось убийством, и исход расследования зависит от храбрых женщин,готовых дать показания о своих ужасных встречах, чтобы наказать убийцу.

programme.title: Преступления из прошлого
programme.desc: Лос-Анджелес, 1922 год. Муж найден убитым, а жена запертой в чулане. Расследуя убийство, детективы попадают в мир соблазнов и помешательства.

programme.title: Балтия
programme.desc: Информационная программа "Балтия" - непредвзятый взгляд на происходящее в Эстонии, Латвии и Литве. События, явления и люди в репортажах корреспондентов "Настоящего Времени", работающих в регионе. Точная и беспристрастная информация, все точки зрения о происходящем в каждой из трех стран, входящих в Евросоюз и военный блок НАТО.

programme.title: Европейские ценности
programme.desc: В русскоязычной среде распространены различные мифы о том, что представляют собой "европейские ценности". Корни их уходят в советскую пропаганду. А современные российские политики все чаще говорят о "гейропе" и "гендерно-нейтральном боге". Под влиянием пропаганды многие на постсоветском пространстве считают, что больницы и школы в Европе хуже, доступны только для богатых, отсутствуют "семейные ценности", ЛГБТ разрушает общество, а сам Запад держится на российском газе, без которого замерзнет. Мы изучили основополагающие ценности Европейского союза и поставили перед собой задачу показать, как они реализуются в повседневной жизни обычных европейцев.

programme.title: Кто вам платит?
programme.desc: Гостем передачи "Кто вам платит?" в студии TVNET+ стал журналист и комментатор Анатолий Крейпанс, с которым мы подвели спортивные итоги 2024 года.

programme.title: Экстрасенсы ведут расследование
programme.desc: 6 сезон шоу "Экстрасенсы ведут расследование", в котором люди со сверхспособностями помогают полиции и частным детективам найти ответы на сложные вопросы, раскрыть настоящие преступления и докопаться до истины.

programme.title: Экстрасенсы ведут расследование
programme.desc: 6 сезон шоу "Экстрасенсы ведут расследование", в котором люди со сверхспособностями помогают полиции и частным детективам найти ответы на сложные вопросы, раскрыть настоящие преступления и докопаться до истины.

programme.title: Экстрасенсы ведут расследование
programme.desc: 6 сезон шоу "Экстрасенсы ведут расследование", в котором люди со сверхспособностями помогают полиции и частным детективам найти ответы на сложные вопросы, раскрыть настоящие преступления и докопаться до истины.

programme.title: Приключения Шерлока Холмса и доктора Ватсона. Сокровища Агры
programme.desc: К Шерлоку Холмсу приходит девушка по имени Мэри Морстен, которая просит его и доктора помочь в разгадке ежегодного получения ею посылкой по одной жемчужине и в поиске её отца, пропавшего много лет назад. Холмс и Ватсон не отказывают ей в помощи и выясняют, что мисс Мэри является наследницей огромного состояния — сокровищ Агры, на которые претендуют также сыновья майора Шолто и Джонатан Смолл — беглый каторжник с деревянным протезом вместо ноги.

programme.title: Я остаюсь
programme.desc: 52-летний доктор Виктор Тырса, семьянин и человек практичный, работает в частной клинике и скептически относится к мнению, что после смерти жизнь не заканчивается. Однажды нетрезвый посетитель боулинга неудачно бросает шар, а Виктор получает травму головы и впадает в кому. Так врач-скептик оказывается в странном месте в компании с такими же, как он — людьми, уже не принадлежащими этому миру, но ещё не принятыми в мир иной.

programme.title: Белая принцесса
programme.desc: Лиззи рожает принца Артура и находит общий язык с Генрихом. Джаспер Тюдор посещает Маргариту Бургундскую и предлагает ей союз, а мать Лиззи Элизабет изгоняют в аббатство Бермондси.

programme.title: Белая принцесса
programme.desc: На горизонте появляются новые политические трудности. Король Генрих снова оказывается на поле битвы за королевство, а Лиззи узнает, что опасность находится ближе, чем кажется.

programme.title: Екатерина. Взлёт
programme.desc: Екатерину не допускают к ее сыну. Салтыкова Елизавета удаляет из дворца. Петр замыкается в себе, не желая видеть жену. Екатерина одна и полностью раздавлена. Именины сына чуть не становятся роковыми для Екатерины: она нарушает запрет Елизаветы покидать дворец. Петра же ждет неожиданность: он сердцем почувствовал, что этот мальчик - его сын. Что предпримет Елизавета? А вдруг случившееся пошатнет трон?

programme.title: Екатерина. Взлёт
programme.desc: Посол Польши князь Понятовский страстно влюбляется в Екатерину и начинает преследовать ее. Граф Шувалов взбешен, он организует расследование, пытаясь понять цель польского посла, докладывает Елизавете о любовной связи Екатерины. Екатерина остается в изоляции. Оказавшись в Измайловском полку, она знакомится с Григорием Орловым и становится свидетельницей его ареста. Екатерина идет на все, чтобы вызволить Орлова из крепости. Орлов влюбляется в свою спасительницу…

programme.title: Мосты Немцова
programme.desc: Зимой 2004-го, сразу после выборов в Украине, на которых было зафиксировано множество фальсификаций, на Майдане Незалежности в Киеве начались протесты. Борис Немцов отправился в Украину, чтобы, по его словам, вместе с братским народом бороться за то, чтобы в стране была свобода и демократия. После победы "оранжевой революции" Борис Немцов становится внештатным советником президента Украины Виктора Ющенко.

programme.title: Мосты Немцова
programme.desc: Опыт Оранжевой революции показал, что оппозиции надо объединяться. Так в 2008 году появляется "Солидарность" - движение выступающее за демократию и права человека. Также Борис Немцов начинает заниматься антикоррупционными расследованиями, и готовит на их основании доклады, которые сам и коллеги по "Солидарности" раздают людям на улицах. На апрель 2009 запланированы досрочные выборы мэра Сочи. Ажиотаж вокруг них был невероятный, потому что Сочи уже был выбран столицей Зимней Олимпиады 2014 года. Немцов также решает баллотироваться в мэры своего родного города.

programme.title: Детали
programme.desc: Армагедон! Аппарат НАСА высадился на астероиде и взял на нем образцы пород. Скрытый потенциал! Ученые из университета Вашингтона "научили" обычный кирпич накапливать электричество. Атлантида! Исследователи предупреждают о скором бесследном исчезновении Большого Барьерного рифа.

programme.title: Детали
programme.desc: Ученые обнаружили воду на освещенной стороне Луны. Кто и зачем создает библиотеку клеток? Самоплавающий транспорт может стать реальностью для перевозок грузов по водным маршрутам. Беби-бум в африканских национальных парках. Все о научных открытиях и новых технологиях в космосе, медицине и IT.

programme.title: Детали
programme.desc: Чем же так порадовала мировую общественность вакцина компании Pfizer. Расскажем об огромных дронах, которые смогут решить проблему ненадежности 5G. Океанологи обнаружили в водах Сейшельских островов десятки новых видов животных.

programme.title: Пять минут тишины
programme.desc: Выпускник Академии МЧС Александр Грек, отличник и завидный жених, готовится к стажировке в штабе. Но неожиданно его отправляют в Карелию, в горноспасательный отряд под руководством опытного и жесткого командира Сергея Гиреева. Саша знакомится со своей новой командой — спасателем Колей Петровым, кинологом по прозвищу Старик, врачом Таней и псом Пузырём. Стажер уверяет, что здесь он всего на несколько дней, но командир советует ему приготовиться к серьезной работе. Уже на первом происшествии Александр рвется помочь, но задание оборачивается для новичка катастрофой…

programme.title: Пять минут тишины
programme.desc: Гиреев отчитывает Грека за то, что тот просил своего влиятельного дядю о переводе в Москву. Майор не скрывает злости на стажера, который не справляется даже с простейшими поручениями. Александр с Колей получают задание — помочь мужчине, который неудачно наступил ногой в ведро и не смог самостоятельно освободиться. Кроме того, на кухне у пострадавшего начался пожар. На другой вызов отправляются Гиреев и Таня, которым предстоит найти пропавшего парапланериста.

programme.title: Желание сердца
programme.desc: Леэ посвятила свою жизнь помощи животным. Кролики, лисы, олени, ежики, белки, лебеди - кого только не довелось выходить и выкормить этой девушке. Зооволонтерство заполняет все свободное время Леэ и поглощает все ее свободные ресурсы. Но, возможно, исполнение одного желания Леэ сможет хоть немного ее разгрузить.

programme.title: Провинциальный детектив
programme.desc: Заведующая городской библиотекой Татьяна Дашкова и медсестра Ольга Брянцева живут в небольшом очаровательном городке с древней историей и дружат с детства. Образованность, начитанность и неиссякаемый интерес к жизни Татьяны, в сочетании с практичностью, находчивостью и живостью ума Ольги дают удивительные результаты. Их тандем способен разобраться в самых запутанных ситуациях и выяснить истинные мотивы любого преступления, которых случается немало в этом, кажущемся спокойным, городке. Главное — внимание к мелочам и деталям, а также хорошее знание детективной литературы. Ведь героиням во всех делах помогают Шерлок Холмс, Отец Браун и другие известные детективы из произведений классической литературы.

programme.title: Провинциальный детектив
programme.desc: Заведующая городской библиотекой Татьяна Дашкова и медсестра Ольга Брянцева живут в небольшом очаровательном городке с древней историей и дружат с детства. programme.title: Провинциальный детектив
programme.desc: Заведующая городской библиотекой Татьяна Дашкова и медсестра Ольга Брянцева живут в небольшом очаровательном городке с древней историей и дружат с детства. programme.title: Кто вам платит?
programme.desc: "Русский голос для Латвии" - это организация, созданная для репрезентации тех русскоязычных жителей Латвии, которые выступают против Владимира Путина и против войны в Украине. С сооснователем "Русского голоса" Сергеем Калининым в эфире программы "Кто вам платит?" поговорили о планах организации в 2025 году и его поездке в Украину.

programme.title: Убийство, тайна и моя семья
programme.desc: Саша и Джереми изучают дело жены, обвиненной в отравлении мужа рисовым пудингом, который содержал достаточно мышьяка, чтобы убить 50 человек.

programme.title: Убийство, тайна и моя семья
programme.desc: Джереми и Саша заново расследуют дело об убийстве 1920-х годов. Не привела ли ошибка судебных медиков к казни невиновного?

programme.title: Духless
programme.desc: Он отказался от всего, что так когда-то ценил - светской жизни, успешной карьеры, роскошного пентхауса. Теперь его стихия - океан. Каждый день он рассекает на серфе теплые волны, омывающие остров Бали. Но невозможно забыть ритм большого города. Случайное знакомство возвращает его в самое сердце современной столицы - высокие технологии, сумасшедшие сделки, смертельный риск и прежняя любовь, которая больше не с ним.

programme.title: Музыкальная интуиция
programme.desc: Уникальное шоу, в котором 10 незнакомцев делают вид, что умеют петь, хотя на самом деле это утверждение правдиво лишь наполовину. Двум звёздным командам из комиков и музыкантов предстоит провести расследование, чтобы отличить певцов от лжецов и выиграть главный приз, который затем отправится в благотворительные фонды.

programme.title: Эксы
programme.desc: Мы разошлись, но не можем друг без друга? Что это - любовь или привычка? Мы готовы на все, чтобы разобраться в наших чувствах. Участники - 10 пар бывших . Они жили вместе, любили друг друга, но по разным причинам - расстались. И все они так и не смогли "завязать" с отношениями. Их по-прежнему тянет друг к другу, они общаются, видятся, многие занимаются сексом. Что это - болезненная зависимость, привычка или любовь? На протяжении проекта пары бывших будут проходить испытания, которые помогут раскрыть их характеры, отношение друг к другу, вскроют самые сокровенные тайны и секреты. Та пара, которая пройдет все испытания и разберется до конца в себе и в своих отношениях, получит крупный денежный приз.

programme.title: Badanamu stāsti
programme.desc: Badanamu stāsti pēta tēmas, kas svarīgas pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, ikdienišķās lietās iesaistot jautrību, iztēli un brīnumus. Iesaistoties stāstos, jaunie skatītāji apgūst svarīgas sociālās, emocionālās un praktiskās iemaņas.

programme.title: Badanamu stāsti
programme.desc: Badanamu stāsti pēta tēmas, kas svarīgas pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, ikdienišķās lietās iesaistot jautrību, iztēli un brīnumus. Iesaistoties stāstos, jaunie skatītāji apgūst svarīgas sociālās, emocionālās un praktiskās iemaņas.

programme.title: Mans mazais ponijs: radi ietekmi
programme.desc: Esiet sveicināti Ekvestrijā, kur poniju maģija ir visapkārt. Ar draugiem Zipu, Saniju Iziju, Pipu un Hiču, piedzīvojumi ilgi nebūs jāgaida.

programme.title: Heidija
programme.desc: Heidija ir maza meitene ar lieliem sapņiem. Viņa Šveices alpos, dzīvojot ar vectēvu,saskaras ar daudzām problēmām. Heidija iepriecina un nomierina cilvēkus un dzīvniekus viņas tuvumā, ar savu entuziasmu, dāsnumu un burvīgo dzīvesprieku.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ir jauka, nekaunīga cūciņa, kas dzīvo ar savu mazo brāli Džordžu, kā arī sivēnu mammu un tēti. Pepas mīļākās nodarbes ir spēļu spēlēšana, pucēšanās, laiskošanās un rotaļāšanās dubļainās peļķēs. Viņas piedzīvojumi allaž beidzas laimīgi, skaļi un rukšķīgi skanot smiekliem.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ir jauka, nekaunīga cūciņa, kas dzīvo ar savu mazo brāli Džordžu, kā arī sivēnu mammu un tēti. Pepas mīļākās nodarbes ir spēļu spēlēšana, pucēšanās, laiskošanās un rotaļāšanās dubļainās peļķēs. Viņas piedzīvojumi allaž beidzas laimīgi, skaļi un rukšķīgi skanot smiekliem.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ir jauka, nekaunīga cūciņa, kas dzīvo ar savu mazo brāli Džordžu, kā arī sivēnu mammu un tēti. Pepas mīļākās nodarbes ir spēļu spēlēšana, pucēšanās, laiskošanās un rotaļāšanās dubļainās peļķēs. Viņas piedzīvojumi allaž beidzas laimīgi, skaļi un rukšķīgi skanot smiekliem.

programme.title: Zemeņu Kūciņa lielpilsētā
programme.desc: Zemeņu kūciņai ir lieli sapņi! Viņa no visas sirds tic, ka lieliski izcepts kārums var uzlabot kāda dienu! Un viņa ir apņēmības pilna ar vienu kūciņu pēc otras "pasauli pārcept par labāku vietu"! Viņas dzimtajā pilsētā Odziņvilā tas nekad nebūtu noticis, tādēļ Zemeņu kūciņa sakravāja somas, satvēra savu kaķi Krēmiņu un devās uz VIENĪGO vietu, kurp dodas visi lielākie cepšanas cienītāji, lai gūtu savu lielo iespēju: LIELĀBOLA PILSĒTU! Ja var cept tur, tad var cept JEBKUR!
